Chinese_text: 去年，我计划去巴黎参加一家著名美术馆的开幕式，展出我最喜欢的艺术家的作品。这是一个千载难逢的机会，我已经准备了几个月。我仔细地存钱，提前买票，并计划了旅程的每一个细节。画廊定于周六晚上开放，我的航班定在周五早上，以确保我有足够的时间。在飞行当天，一切都开始出错。我起床比计划晚了，因为我熬夜了。前一天晚上收拾行李，我匆匆忙忙地完成了早上的例行公事，吃完早餐，匆匆叫了一辆出租车去机场。司机试图在早上的交通中穿行，但似乎每条路都很拥挤。我每隔几分钟就紧张地看一次手表，随着时间的流逝，我的心在寻找。当我们到达机场时，离起飞只剩下20分钟了。我冲向值机柜台，却被告知登机口已经关闭，我的航班已经开始登机了。我难以置信地站在那里，看着登机牌上我的航班状态变为起飞。我很失望。失望是压倒性的。我期待这次活动已经很久了。想象一下，我走在画廊里，周围环绕着一位深深启发我的艺术家的作品。错过了航班，感觉就像我让梦想从指间溜走了。与这种经历相关的情感让我欣赏旅途中的时刻，这就是我今天在这里的原因。准备和时机的重要性。这提醒我们永远不要把机会视为理所当然。
English_text: Last year, I planned a trip to Paris to attend the opening of a renowned art gallery showcasing the work of my favorite artist. This was a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I had been preparing for months. I had carefully saved up, purchased tickets well in advance, and planned every detail of the journey. The gallery was scheduled to open on a Saturday evening, and my flight was set for Friday morning to ensure I had plenty of time. On the day of the flight, everything started to go wrong. I woke up later than planned because I had stayed up. Packing the night before, I rushed through my morning routine, keeping breakfast and hurriedly called a taxi to the airport. The driver tried to navigate the morning traffic, but it seemed every road was congested. I nervously checked my watch every few minutes, my heart seeking as the minutes ticked by. By the time we reached the airport, I had only 20 minutes left before takeoff. I sprinted to the check-in counter only to be told that the gate had closed and my flight had already begun boarding. I stood there in disbelief, watching the departure board as my flight status changed to departed. I was disappointed. The disappointment was overwhelming. I had looked forward to this event for so long. Imagine myself walking through the gallery surrounded by the works of an artist who had inspired me deeply. Missing the flight felt like I had let the dream slip through my fingers. Emotions tied to such an experience makes me appreciate the moments of journey, that's why I'm here today. the importance of preparation and timing. It's a reminder to never take opportunities for granted.

Chinese_text: 我记得是2023年的暑假,我上大二,我弟刚高考完,所以说打算去福州找他玩一段时间。因为我弟因为高考的缘故,所以说寒假过年的时候都没有聚一聚,因为他要复习他的考试科目,然后为高考做准备,所以说我们也不能去打扰他。然后就现在来看,他高考确实考到了一个相当不错的成绩。他在上海调大理政道实验吧,学物理。然后就那个暑假,所以说我特别想念他。毕竟太久没有见到面了。所以说去到他那儿玩的时候,就把一些高中时候没有玩的游戏全都玩了个遍,像什么英雄联盟,五味契约这些游戏。就我们两个就双排就一起打游戏,就觉得特别有意思。然后除了打游戏之外,我们还会出去一些找一些当地的一些特色的美食。像福州比较出名的鱼王肉宴,还有像什么老化蟹面什么的,都尝了个遍。福州的美食是特别有意思,但是像一些比较出名的一条就是叫三档旗下,那里有特别多的小吃,还有当地的一些纪念品啥的。但我跟我弟嘛都是本地人。所以说也也不太熟悉。所以说也也不太熟悉。也就是去那边找一些好吃的。然后玩了那段时间,我觉得特别的快乐。然后每天晚上都一两点就聊天,聊天聊到一两点,然后才睡觉。然后现在他也在读大学,我也在读大学。然后每次也只有等到一些寒暑假之类的他能见到面。所以说我觉得那段时光特别的快乐。
English_text: I remember it was summer vacation in 2023, I was in my sophomore year, and my younger brother had just finished his college entrance examination, so I planned to go to Fuzhou to visit him for a while. Because my younger brother didn't get together during the winter vacation and Chinese New Year due to the college entrance examination, he had to review his exam subjects and prepare for the exam, so we couldn't disturb him either. And now, looking at it, he did achieve a pretty good score in the college entrance examination. He will be conducting political experiments in Shanghai to study physics. And then it was that summer vacation, so I really miss him. After all, it's been too long since we last met. So when I went to play with him, I played all the games I didn't play in high school, like League of Legends and Five Flavor Contract. Just the two of us playing games together in a double row, I found it particularly interesting. Besides playing games, we will also go out and find some local specialties. I have tried everything from the famous Fish King Meat Banquet in Fuzhou to the aged crab noodles. Fuzhou's cuisine is particularly interesting, but one of the more famous ones is called SanSanqi, where there are a lot of snacks and local souvenirs. But my brother and I are both locals. So I'm not very familiar either. So I'm not very familiar either. That's to find some delicious food over there. And after playing that time, I felt particularly happy. Then we chat every night at one or two o'clock, chat until one or two o'clock, and then go to bed. And now he is also studying at university, and I am also studying at university. Then he could only meet him during some winter or summer vacations. So I think that time was particularly happy.

Chinese_text: 这就是我的故事。几年前，我和姐姐去了香港，其中一个亮点是参观兰桂坊，一个受欢迎的酒吧区。这是我们第一次去那里，我们很高兴能体验到我们听说过的充满活力的夜生活。狭窄的街道上挤满了人，能量是电的，音乐从四面八方传来，笑声和笑声在小巷里回荡。那天晚上，有一场活动，人们打扮成不同的角色。我们看到超级英雄、卡通人物，甚至一些历史人物四处走动。感觉就像我们在看电影。我们找到了一家看起来很有趣的酒吧，进去了。气氛很好，人们跳舞，跟着流行歌曲唱歌，度过了一个美好的夜晚。我和姐姐点了些饮料，秋天也来了。我们跳舞、大笑，甚至交了几个也从其他地方来的新朋友。这就是爱。
English_text: And this is my story. A few years ago, my sister and I went to Hong Kong, and one of the highlights of our trip was visiting Lan Kwai Fong, a popular bar district. It was our first time there, and we were excited to experience the vibrant nightlife that we had heard so much about. The narrow streets were filled with people and the energy was electric, music blared from all directions and laughter laughter and laughter echoed down the alleys. That night there was some kind of event where people dressed up as different characters. We saw superheroes, cartoon figures, and even some historical characters walking around. It felt like we were in a movie. We found a bar that looked interesting and went in. The atmosphere was lovely, with people dancing, singing along to popular songs, and just having a good night. My sister and I ordered some drinks and joined in the fall. We danced, laughed, and even made a few new friends who were also visiting from other places. So that was love.

Chinese_text: 我和几个同学在2017年的夏天自驾去了长白山,走的是公路所以路途比较长,沿途的风景交错变化,有树,铁路,草地,是不是还能看到几条小河,一路上有说有笑,所以车程不算特别无聊。好,抵达齐金城我们第一件事就是去品尝当地的铁锅炖,虽然铁锅炖冬天吃更有感觉,但去都去了,夏天闷得满头湿汗也得尝一口,那里精心搭配好的酱汁将各种配菜都煮烂包裹在一个大面饼里,就这米饭现在想想都还意犹未尽。最后我们又去了长白山,因为那里比较凉爽的天气让我们短暂逃离了北京的蒸炉,景色很优美。一遇匆匆的树林里面,而且空气很清新,穿梭在云雾之间感觉像在仙境里一样,然后侧面还有山泉有下几只鹰盘旋飞过,咱那里仿佛接受了来自大自然的拥抱。之后我们去吃了东北烧烤,那里的烤串是一大特色,据说东北人是没有不会烤串的,然后肉量和菜品都特别实诚,火候掌握得刚刚好。不像那些低摊小贩。我们吃了这些肉串,做的又瘦又硬的肉串,我们吃到的串都可以用鲜香肥美来形容,就肥瘦相间,冒着热气,然后还能发出点滋啦滋啦的声音,现在想想还是会流口水。然后我们还尝了几大当地的特色菜肴,比如说第三鲜,锅包肉,还有牛肉段,这些菜虽然各地外卖都能吃得到,但真正到了东北咱才能吃到最正宗的味道。现炒上桌还能拿出糖色的锅包肉。然后看起来黑乎乎一盘的第三鲜,但其中每一个菜块都沾上了勾好芡的酱汁,然后又是一个下饭绝配。那里的菜品价格比较便宜,而且绝不缺金少两。老板都特别热情,在等菜期间还会给我们送自家腌制的小菜啊,或者是开胃的凉拌菜,也和我们唠唠唠家常。在与老板的沟通交流中,连我们说话的口音都变得有点东北味。还是东北对人口音的影响。这次旅行有旅途上小打小闹,有站在长白山上时的星矿神医,还有地道东北菜待的极致享受,算是一个享受或者治愈的旅途吧。
English_text: A few classmates and I drove to Changbai Mountain in the summer of 2017 by road, so the journey was quite long. The scenery along the way was varied and intertwined, with trees, railways, grasslands, and even a few small rivers. We talked and laughed along the way, so the journey was not particularly boring. Okay, the first thing we do when we arrive at Qijin City is to taste the local iron pot stew. Although iron pot stew is more enjoyable to eat in winter, we have already gone there. Even in the summer, when we were so stuffy that we were sweating profusely, we still had to take a bite. The carefully prepared sauce there boiled all kinds of side dishes and wrapped them in a big pancake. Just thinking about this rice now, we still feel unsatisfied. Finally, we went to Changbai Mountain again because the cooler weather there allowed us to briefly escape from Beijing's steam ovens, and the scenery was very beautiful. Once in a hurried forest, and the air was very fresh, shuttling between clouds and mist felt like being in a fairyland. Then, there was a mountain spring and a few eagles hovering and flying by, as if we had received a embrace from nature. Afterwards, we went to have Northeast barbecue, where grilled skewers are a major specialty. It is said that there are no Northeasterners who are not good at grilling skewers, and the meat and dishes are very sincere, with just the right heat control. Unlike those low street vendors. We have eaten these meat skewers, which are both thin and hard. The skewers we have eaten can be described as fresh, fragrant, and delicious, with a combination of fat and thin, emitting hot air, and making a slight sizzling sound. Looking back now, it still makes my mouth water. Then we also tried several local specialty dishes, such as Third Fresh, Pan Bao Rou, and Beef Duan. Although these dishes can be found in takeout from various places, we can only taste the most authentic flavor in Northeast China. When stir fried and served, you can still bring out the sugar colored pan fried pork. Then there was the third dish that looked dark, but each dish was coated with a sauce that had been thickened, making it a perfect complement to the meal. The prices of the dishes there are relatively cheap, and there is no shortage of gold or silver. The bosses are very enthusiastic, and during the waiting period, they even bring us homemade pickled vegetables or appetizers, and chat with us about our daily lives. In our communication with the boss, even our accents have become a bit Northeastern. The influence of Northeast China on people's accents. This trip had some playful moments along the way, including the Star Mine Doctor standing on Changbai Mountain, and the ultimate enjoyment of authentic Northeastern cuisine. It can be considered a journey of enjoyment or healing.

Chinese_text: 我记得在2023年的夏天,我邀请我和我的家人一起来北京玩,因为我在北京幼练大学上学。这次旅游和以往不同的是,以前北京对我来说不算是一个故乡,因为我每次得坐高铁才能到这里来,但这次不一样的事,我就在这上学,所以我不需要坐高铁。我们大概玩了有一个星期左右的时间,当初一开始准备的是跟团友,但是后来我们想了一下,因为照顾到团队里有很多老人和小孩,所以最后我们决定选择一个叫协程的定制游,就是包车。我记得当时一共花了差不多有好几万块,感觉还是挺贵的,但是体验的话其实也没有那么好,因为跟团游当时发生了一些不太好的事情,比如说因为一些交通的管制,车辆,我们当时包的车不能及时的到达我们这里,还有就是司机可能有点偷懒,不想来接我们,所以虽然给他钱了,但他没有给我们认真工作,最后呢,协程也给我们一些补偿。那你要问我开不开心吧,其实一般般,因为虽然他给我补偿了,但是感觉还是有点亏,所以我还是不太喜欢这个行程。所以最后我们也去了不少地方,来了北京人大学,还有一些昌城呀,故宫呀,还有很多其他的地方。然后我发现这个很多地方其实都不是很好抢票,抢票的话都要凭手速。印象最深的地方应该是环球影城,环球影城还是挺好玩的,里面有很多喜欢的电影角色,小黄人,还有一些奇妙的角色,还有其他的东西,感觉还是挺好玩的。我记得最后一天的话,我们去的那个是故宫,其实觉得最后一天去故宫其实不太合适,但是还是最后一天去了,因为你知道抢票很难。所以最后一天去故宫的时候,我记得当时好像还有人穿皇帝的衣服进去拍照,我觉得这个想法还挺新奇的。嗯,总的来说,这是我的最后一天的故宫。嗯,总的来说,这是我的最后一天的故宫。嗯,总的来说,这是我的最后一天的故宫。嗯,总的来说,这是我的最后一天的故宫。嗯,总的来说,这是我的最后一天的故宫。嗯,总的来说,这是一次还不错的旅行,但是也有一些不太好的事情嘛。因为你知道谢神他那边司机有点懒,所以这就是我的故事。
English_text: I remember in the summer of 2023, I invited my family and I to come and play in Beijing because I am studying at Beijing Youlian University. What's different about this trip is that in the past, Beijing wasn't considered a hometown for me because I had to take the high-speed train every time to come here. But this time, it's different because I'm studying here, so I don't need to take the high-speed train. We played for about a week. At the beginning of the first year, we prepared to join our group, but later we thought about it and decided to choose a customized tour called Xiecheng, which is a chartered car, because we took care of many elderly and children in the team. I remember spending almost tens of thousands of yuan at that time, which felt quite expensive, but the experience wasn't that good either. There were some bad things that happened during the group tour, such as traffic restrictions, vehicles, and the car we booked couldn't arrive at our place in time. Also, the driver may have been a bit lazy and didn't want to pick us up. So although he gave us money, he didn't work hard for us. In the end, Xiecheng also gave us some compensation. So you have to ask me if I'm happy driving, it's just average because although he compensated me, I still feel a bit disappointed, so I still don't really like this itinerary. So in the end, we also went to many places, including Peking University, Changcheng, the Forbidden City, and many other places. Then I found that many places are actually not very easy to grab tickets, and if you want to grab tickets, you have to rely on speed. The most impressive place should be Universal Studios. Universal Studios is very interesting. There are many favorite movie characters, little yellow people, some wonderful characters, and other things in it. It's still very interesting. I remember on the last day, we went to the Forbidden City. Actually, I didn't think it was suitable to go there on the last day, but it was still the last day because you know it's difficult to grab tickets. So on the last day when I went to the Forbidden City, I remember someone wearing the emperor's clothes went in to take photos, and I thought this idea was quite novel. Well, overall, this is my last day at the Forbidden City. Well, overall, this is my last day at the Forbidden City. Well, overall, this is my last day at the Forbidden City. Well, overall, this is my last day at the Forbidden City. Well, overall, this is my last day at the Forbidden City. Well, overall, it was a pretty good trip, but there were also some bad things. Because you know that Xie Shen's driver is a bit lazy, so this is my story.

Chinese_text: 早在2020年，我就去看望了我的高中同学纪江。他在浙江大学，所以我去浙江杭州看望他。我们计划一起去西湖看看美丽的风景。但由于一场事故，该计划取消了。就在我去杭州之前，我的朋友纪江的腿受伤了。所以，我们终于去看电影了。与他共度了一段非常愉快的时光。因为他是我最好的朋友之一。所以，无论我们做什么，我们仍然玩得很开心。之后，我们去了一家餐厅品尝杭州的一些名菜。我仍然记得很多菜。比如西湖楚瑜。还有龙井。任丁霞。东坡柔。等等。它们非常美味。直到今天，我仍然无法忘记它的味道。我在杭州玩得很开心。我迫不及待地想下次去杭州。希望。可以在这里再次体验更多有趣的事情。
English_text: Back in 2020, I went to visit my high school classmate, Ji Jiang. He was in Zhejiang University, so I went to Zhejiang, Hangzhou to visit him. We planned to visit West Lake together to see the beautiful landscape. But because of an accident, the plan cancelled. My friend, Ji Jiang, made his leg hurt just yesterday before I went to Hangzhou. So, we finally went to see a movie. It was a very happy time with him. Because he was one of my best friends. So, no matter what we do, we still have a good time. After that, we went to a restaurant to taste some famous dishes in Hangzhou. I can still remember many dishes. For example, like Xihu Chuyu. And Longjing. Dingxia Ren. Dongpo Rou. And so on. They were very delicious. Until today, I still can't forget the flavor. I enjoyed a very good time in Hangzhou. And I can't wait the next time I want to Hangzhou. Hope. Can experience more interesting things here again.

Chinese_text: 当我们第一次报名参加同一个小组时，我遇到了我的女朋友。她很漂亮，但很沉默。为了以后讨论如何做我们的工作，我们交换了我们的微信ID。所有的工作都完成后，我请她有一天出来逛逛。当我发出这条信息时，我很兴奋。即使她说是的，我仍然无法相信这是真的。此外，我非常紧张，因为这是我第一次和女孩一起散步。我们在学校里逛了很长时间，聊了很多事情，从学习到梦想未来。最后，我很高兴听到她说她喜欢和我一起出去玩，并期待下次我们出来聊天。我们几次出去玩后，我给她买了花，在她甚至不知道的时候送给了她。她很惊讶。然后我向她表白。我问她是否愿意做我的女朋友。她答应了。到目前为止，我们已经在一起将近650天了。是的，那是个巧合。我们关系密切并非巧合。全面的经验尚不清楚。
English_text: I met my girlfriend when we signed up in the same group for the first time. She was pretty but silent. In order to talk about how to do our work later, we exchanged our WeChat IDs. After all the works were done, I asked her to come out and hang around one day. I was excited when I sent that message. Even she said yes, I still cannot believe that was real. Also, I was very nervous because that was my first time walk around with a girl. We went around the school for a long time and talked about a lot of things, from study to dreaming future. At the end of the day, I was so glad to hear that she said she likes going around with me and expects the next time we come out and chat with each other. After our few times hanging out, I bought flowers for her and gave her when she did not even know it. She was surprised. Then I declared my love for her. I asked whether she would like to be my girlfriend. She said yes. Until now, we had been together for almost 650 days. Yes, that was a coincidence. It isذ not a coincidence that we became close. The full-blown experience was unclear.

Chinese_text: 那是一个充满期待的日子,我终于亲自去到了美国参加了一场NBA的比赛。不仅如此,我还获得了一个与篮球巨星勒布朗·詹姆斯见面的机会。这一切听起来像是一个梦,但是当我站在洛杉矶的斯台普斯中心门前时,我几乎不敢相信自己的眼睛。我已经是詹姆斯的忠实粉丝,从他刚进联盟的那个赛季开始,我就一直关注了他的比赛,见证了他从克里夫兰到迈阿密,再到回到克里夫兰,再到最终加入洛杉矶湖人,获得多个总冠军的辉煌历程。能够亲眼见到他,甚至与他面对面交流,对我来说简直是无与伦比的荣耀。那天,我早早地来到比赛场地,空气中弥漫着兴奋与紧张的气氛,湖人队将对阵勇士,球迷们聚集在门外面,兴奋地讨论着比赛的预测和球员的表现。终于,工作人员带我进入了专门为媒体和VIP嘉宾准备的区域,这里可以近距离观察到球队的准备过程。当我走进球员更衣室的走廊时,突然听到了一阵沉重的摇晃声,我转身,眼前就出现了那位从小就崇拜的篮球巨星勒布朗·詹姆斯。他穿着湖人队的训练服,手上拿着一瓶水,正走向训练场地。虽然他看起来非常专注,但当他看到我时微微一笑,似乎对我并不陌生。我们开始讨论篮球,也聊到了他个人的生活。他告诉我,除了安球场地的挑战,家庭和社会责任是他人生中最重要的部分。他提到,作为一名运动员,还有时也会面临巨大压力,但他始终相信通过团队的支持和不懈努力,一切困难都能够克服。我问他,在你漫长的职业生涯中,什么时候让你觉得最为骄傲?詹姆斯沉思了拍一颗,微微笑着回答,我最大的骄傲就是能够为我的家乡克里夫兰带回那个总冠军广杯。那是我们团队奋斗的结果,也是我职业生涯中最难忘的一刻。赢得总冠军不只是为了我自己,而是为了那些一直支持我的球迷和家乡的人。在短短的交流中,詹姆斯对给我留下了深刻的印象。他的谦逊、专注、他对篮球的热爱远远超出了我对他的认识。他不仅是场上的超级巨星,场下的他也充满智慧和人情味。当我与他告别时,我感到一种难以言喻的满足感。能够与詹姆斯这样的伟大运动员面对面交流,是我人生中最宝贵的经历之一。尽管我知道,像詹姆斯这样的人物,可能以上只有那么一次偶遇。但他的一份专注和热情的精神,将永远激励我不断追求自己的梦想。比赛开始了,我坐在场边,眼睛紧紧盯着球上的每一刻。詹姆斯在场上表现如同平常一样令人惊叹,而在场外的那一刻,他的真诚和谦逊也深深地触动了我。That's all, thank you.请不吝点赞 订阅 转发 打赏支持明镜与点点栏目
English_text: It was a day full of anticipation, and I finally personally went to the United States to participate in an NBA game. Not only that, I also had the opportunity to meet basketball superstar LeBron James. All of this sounds like a dream, but as I stand in front of the Staples Center in Los Angeles, I can hardly believe my eyes. I am already a loyal fan of James. Since the season he first entered the league, I have been following his games and witnessing his glorious journey from Cleveland to Miami, back to Cleveland, and finally joining the Los Angeles Lakers to win multiple championships. To be able to see him with my own eyes, and even communicate with him face-to-face, is an unparalleled honor for me. That day, I arrived at the game venue early, and the atmosphere was filled with excitement and tension as the Lakers faced the Warriors. Fans gathered outside the door, excitedly discussing the game's predictions and players' performances. Finally, the staff took me into an area specially prepared for the media and VIP guests, where I could observe the team's preparation process up close. As I walked into the hallway of the players' locker room, I suddenly heard a heavy shaking sound. I turned around and saw the basketball superstar LeBron James whom I had admired since childhood. He was wearing a Lakers training uniform, holding a bottle of water, and walking towards the training ground. Although he looks very focused, he smiled slightly when he saw me, as if he was not unfamiliar with me. We started discussing basketball and also talked about his personal life. He told me that besides the challenges of playing on the field, family and social responsibility are the most important parts of his life. He mentioned that as an athlete, one may sometimes face immense pressure, but he always believes that with the support and unremitting efforts of the team, all difficulties can be overcome. I asked him, during your long career, when did you feel the most proud? James pondered and took a pat, then smiled slightly as he replied, 'My greatest pride is being able to bring back the championship trophy for my hometown Cleveland.'. That was the result of our team's hard work and also the most unforgettable moment of my career. Winning the championship is not just for myself, but for the fans and people in my hometown who have always supported me. In a short conversation, James left a deep impression on me. His humility, focus, and love for basketball far exceed what I know of him. He is not only a superstar on the field, but also full of wisdom and human touch off the field. When I bid farewell to him, I felt an indescribable sense of satisfaction. Being able to communicate face-to-face with great athletes like James is one of the most valuable experiences of my life. Although I know that characters like James may only have encountered each other once. But his focused and passionate spirit will always inspire me to constantly pursue my dreams. The game started, and I sat on the sidelines, staring closely at every moment on the ball. James' performance on the court was as stunning as usual, and in that moment off the court, his sincerity and humility deeply touched me. That's all, thank you. Please feel free to like, subscribe, forward, and give rewards to support the Mingjing and Dian Dian columns

Chinese_text: 几周前，我去了一个现场直播的房子，去见我的偶像史仪。这是她第一次在北京开始自己的房子。所以我珍惜这个机会，立刻买了票。当我终于到达那里时，我看到了很多和我一样的粉丝。他们免费送给我们很多小礼物。这真的非常非常有帮助。这对我来说真的很开心。然而，因为人太多了，所以当我进屋时，我的地方离舞台有点远。但这并没有影响我听美妙绝伦的音乐的热情。但这并没有影响我听美妙绝伦的音乐的热情。但这并没有影响我听美妙绝伦的音乐的热情。更神奇的是，我被选为幸运儿，可以上台和我的偶像一起洗澡。当时我真的很兴奋，我无法形容当时的心情。然而，这真是太幸福了。
English_text: I went to a live house several weeks ago for meeting my idol, Shi Yi. And that was the first time for her to start a live house in Beijing. So I cherished that opportunity and bought my ticket instantly. And when I finally arrived there, I saw a lot of fans just like me. They sent us many little gifts for free. And that was really, really helpful. And that was really, really happy for me. However, because there are too many people, so when I got into the house, my place is a little bit far from the stage. But it doesn't affect my passion of listening to the beautiful, amazing music. But it doesn't affect my passion of listening to the beautiful, amazing music. But it doesn't affect my passion of listening to the beautiful, amazing music. What is more fantastic is I was selected as the lucky one to go on to the stage and take a shower with my idol. I was really excited at that time and I couldn't certainly describe the mood that time. However, it's just so happy.

Chinese_text: 2012年,我去了西藏,我在拉萨降落,立即被那里的壮丽自然景观所吸引。第一天,我参观了布达拉宫,宫殿非常雄伟,金碧辉煌,给我留下了深刻的印象。我还见到了许多身穿传统服饰的藏民,他们都非常友好。我在布达拉宫听了导游的解说,了解了西藏的历史和宗教。下午,我去了大昭寺,那里有许多古老的佛像和壁画,我感到一种深深的宁静和敬畏,仿佛置身于另一个世界。第二天,我去了纳木错湖,湖水非常清澈。周围都是巍峨的雪山,我在湖边散步,享受着清新的空气和宁静的环境。我还租了一艘小船,划到了湖中心,水下的景色非常美丽,我能清晰地看到水中的鱼和植物。当天晚上,我在湖边的一家小旅馆上,我看到了一座小沙漠。我看到了一座小沙漠,我看到了一座小沙漠。旅馆老板告诉我,当地僧人会在这里举行一些特殊的仪式,我决定第二天去参加。第三天,我进行了一次徒步旅行,穿过了高原上的草垫和河流。高原的景色非常壮观,我看到了许多野生动物,比如藏羚羊和藏野驴。这次旅行让我感到心旷神怡,也对我个人的成长产生了巨大的影响。每次回想起这次旅行,我都感到非常高兴和感激。
English_text: In 2012, I went to Xizang. When I landed in Lhasa, I was immediately attracted by the magnificent natural landscape there. On the first day, I visited the Potala Palace, which was magnificent and magnificent, leaving a deep impression on me. I also saw many Tibetan people wearing traditional costumes, and they were all very friendly. I listened to the guide's explanation in Potala Palace and learned about the history and religion of Xizang. In the afternoon, I went to Jokhang Temple, where there were many ancient Buddha statues and murals. I felt a deep sense of tranquility and awe, as if I were in another world. The next day, I went to Lake Namco, and the water was very clear. Surrounded by towering snow capped mountains, I took a walk by the lake, enjoying the fresh air and peaceful environment. I also rented a small boat and rowed to the center of the lake. The underwater scenery was very beautiful, and I could clearly see the fish and plants in the water. That evening, I was at a small hotel by the lake and saw a small desert. I saw a small desert, I saw a small desert. The hotel owner told me that local monks will hold some special ceremonies here, and I decided to attend the next day. On the third day, I went on a hiking trip, crossing grass mats and rivers on the plateau. The scenery of the plateau is very spectacular. I saw many wild animals, such as Tibetan antelopes and Tibetan wild donkeys. This trip made me feel refreshed and had a huge impact on my personal growth. Every time I think back on this trip, I feel very happy and grateful.

Chinese_text: 去年,我有机会去了杭州,拜访了我多年的朋友,这次旅行真的让我特别期待,因为杭州以西湖美景和丰富的文化著称。到了那里之后,我们首先去了特别著名的西湖景点,那里天气晴朗,阳光洒在湖面上,湖水波光粼粼,特别美丽。我们沿着湖边的步道慢慢走着,感受着清新的空气和悠闲的氛围,湖边的柳树随风摇曳,仿佛在向我们招手。周围还可以听到小鸟的叫声,整个环境非常宁静,朋友和我在湖边聊了许多,谈起了彼此这些年的生活变化,感觉非常的亲切。接着,我们还乘船游览了西湖,船在湖面上缓缓前行。我们在湖边的河沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙�这道菜背后的故事据说是苏东坡当年创造的真的非常有趣吃完饭后我们又去了一个茶馆杭州的龙井茶特别有名我们点了几杯坐在茶馆里慢慢品味看着窗外的夜景渐渐降临湖面上灯光闪烁映出一片宁静的美景那种感觉很温馨也让我对杭州有了更深的喜爱这次旅行不仅让我领略到了杭州的美丽风光也让我和朋友有了更多的交流拉近了彼此的距离回到家后我一直念念不忘那段美好的时光杭州真是一个令人流连忘返的地方
English_text: Last year, I had the opportunity to visit my long-time friend in Hangzhou. This trip really made me look forward to it because Hangzhou is known for its beautiful West Lake scenery and rich culture. After arriving there, we first went to the particularly famous West Lake scenic spot, where the weather was clear, the sunlight shone on the lake surface, and the lake water was sparkling and beautiful. We walked slowly along the path by the lake, feeling the fresh air and leisurely atmosphere. The willow trees by the lake swayed in the wind, as if beckoning to us. You can also hear the chirping of birds around, and the whole environment is very peaceful. My friends and I talked a lot by the lake, talking about the changes in our lives over the years, and felt very familiar. Next, we also took a boat tour of West Lake, and the boat slowly moved forward on the surface of the lake. We are in the river by the lake, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand, sand Watching the night view gradually descend outside the window, the flickering lights on the lake reflecting a peaceful scenery, that feeling is very warm and has deepened my love for Hangzhou. This trip not only allowed me to appreciate the beautiful scenery of Hangzhou, but also allowed me and my friends to With more communication, we have become closer to each other. After returning home, I can never forget that wonderful time. Hangzhou is truly a place that is unforgettable
Extracted_Text: 去年,我有机会去了杭州,拜访了我多年的朋友,这次旅行真的让我特别期待,因为杭州以西湖美景和丰富的文化著称。到了那里之后,我们首先去了特别著名的西湖景点,那里天气晴朗,阳光洒在湖面上,湖水波光粼粼,特别美丽。我们沿着湖边的步道慢慢走着,感受着清新的空气和悠闲的氛围,湖边的柳树随风摇曳,仿佛在向我们招手。周围还可以听到小鸟的叫声,整个环境非常宁静,朋友和我在湖边聊了许多,谈起了彼此这些年的生活变化,感觉非常的亲切。接着,我们还乘船游览了西湖,船在湖面上缓缓前行。我们在湖边的河沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙沙�这道菜背后的故事据说是苏东坡当年创造的真的非常有趣吃完饭后我们又去了一个茶馆杭州的龙井茶特别有名我们点了几杯坐在茶馆里慢慢品味看着窗外的夜景渐渐降临湖面上灯光闪烁映出一片宁静的美景那种感觉很温馨也让我对杭州有了更深的喜爱这次旅行不仅让我领略到了杭州的美丽风光也让我和朋友有了更多的交流拉近了彼此的距离回到家后我一直念念不忘那段美好的时光杭州真是一个令人流连忘返的地方

Chinese_text: 大约一周前，我去海南看望我高中时最好的朋友。这是我很久没见到的人了。海南是个好地方。阳光明媚，海滩又长又沙，风感觉真好。我立刻爱上了蓝色的大海。我和同学们花了很多时间在海滩上散步。风吹在我们脸上，让我们觉得我们回到了高中，在一起玩得很开心。我们谈了很多关于我们的过去。我们记得上学的日子、我们的梦想和年轻的时候。感觉那些日子就在昨天。我们也聊了起来。我们品尝了海南的特色菜。它真的很好吃，我们吃得很开心。但这次旅行不仅仅是为了参观海南的美丽景点。这也是我与高中朋友重新联系的机会。我们互相鼓励，并承诺为更美好的未来努力工作。感觉真好。感觉真好。再次和他们在一起感觉真好。现在我回家了。但我会永远记得这次旅行，以及我和老朋友度过的美好时光。谢谢你的聆听。
English_text: About one week ago, I took a trip to Hainan to see my best friend from high school. It's someone I hadn't seen for a really long time. Hainan is such a wonderful place. The sun is shining brightly, the beaches are long and sandy, and the wind feels so good. I fell in love with the big blue sea right away. My classmates and I spent a lot of time walking on the beach. The wind blowing on our face made us feel like we were back in high school, having so much fun together. We talked a lot about our past. We remembered school days, our dreams, and being young. It felt like those days were just yesterday. We also chatted. We tried Hainan's special food. It was really tasty, and we had a great time eating it. But this trip was more than just about seeing Hainan's beautiful places. It was also a chance to reconnect with my high school friends. We encouraged each other and made a promise to work hard for a better future. It feels so good. It feels so good. It feels so good to be with them again. Now I'm back home. But I'll always remember the trip and the great time I had with my old friends. Thank you for listening.

Chinese_text: 两个周,两个星期之前,我和我的朋友一起去公园玩。我们在公园里散步,路边有很多不同品种的树。我们一边观察它们的叶子形状有什么不同,一边拍照,在网上查一些我们不认识的树木的品种。我们正走着走着,看见了很多可爱的小狗,其中一只很胖的拉布拉多,让我印象深刻。一位老爷爷牵着它,在离我们很远的地方,那只狗非常兴奋地冲我们腰尾巴。当它走到我们身边的时候,它一下子扑过来,用它的头和身子蹭我们的腿。它非常的胖,并且坐在了我的脚上,我能感觉到它的身子很重。我们还看见了一只很大的金毛犬,它的舌头是紫色的,看起来很奇怪。那天,我们还去了学校附近的一家披萨店,吃了一张非常美味的披萨。我们两个都非常开心,最后我们一起坐公交车回学校了。这一天就结束了。
English_text: Two weeks ago, my friends and I went to the park to play. We took a walk in the park, and there were many different species of trees along the roadside. We observe the differences in leaf shapes while taking photos and searching online for some unfamiliar tree species. We were walking and saw many cute little dogs, including a chubby Labrador, which left a deep impression on me. An old man was holding it, far away from us, and the dog was very excited, running its tail towards our waist. When it walked up to us, it pounced and rubbed its head and body against our legs. It is very fat and sitting on my feet, I can feel its body is heavy. We also saw a large golden retriever with a purple tongue that looked strange. That day, we also went to a pizza shop near the school and had a very delicious pizza. We were both very happy, and in the end we took the bus back to school together. This day has come to an end.

Chinese_text: 有一天，我突然收到一个失散多年的同学的来信，他是我多年没有联系的人。他在信中说，过去几年他一直在另一个城市工作，刚刚回到我们的家乡。他提到他想和我谈谈某件事。我们上次见面还不到两年，回想我们的高中时光，我忍不住感到有点情绪化。所以，我决定和他见面，迎头赶上。我们约定在一家咖啡馆见面，这是我以前经常去的地方。我很早就到了，想既然我们上次见面还没多久，他可能有很多话要说。经过一天的会面，我想了想，决定去见他。我想了想他在我班上做什么，但我搞不清楚他在做什么。我想了想他在我班上做什么，但我搞不清楚他在做什么。与此同时，我终于看到他走进棺材。他似乎几乎没有指责，嘲笑。西尔维娅露出了灿烂而迷人的笑容。我们坐下来后，他开始谈论从部落学校导师到我们现在生活的道路。渐渐地，他的话题开始发生奇怪的转变。他告诉我，这些年来他做了一些投资，还有一些有趣的人，甚至提到他现在有一些非常复杂的商业交易。听了这话，我有点漠不关心，但并没有多想。然而，当我们看着他讲述自己的经历时，我感到一种奇怪的不可靠性。回想起来，他并不是当时最成熟的人。在整个谈话中，我注意到他经常提到同情。他说他是个非常善良的人，而且他是个很善良的人。他的善良和那些我一无所知的人给我留下了深刻的印象。他的转变变得越来越神秘。就在我正要离开的时候，他惊人的正义把我带到了一个地方，向我展示他的新项目。我们走出棺材，径直走到大楼前。它看起来像一个建筑工厂，但它自信地说，这是他的棺材，他的办公室。我很困惑。投资者为什么要投资一栋建筑？我很惊讶。这是因为投资者不应该选择这样的办公室。即便如此，他还是显得很冷静，告诉我办公室里的麻烦还在继续。我开始觉得有些不对劲。但当我转过身时，整个场景似乎都变得陌生了。我离开时，他对我说：欢迎你随时回来。我们还有很多话要说。直到我离开，我仍然无法决定那天晚上是否真实。尤其是看到他的办公室时。
English_text: One day, I suddenly received a message from a long-lost classmate, someone I hadn't been in contact with for many years. In the message, he said he had been working in another city for the past few years and had just returned to our hometown. He mentioned that he wanted to talk to me about something. It hadn't been two years since we last saw each other, and thinking back to our high school days, I couldn't help but feel a bit emotional. So, I decided to meet up with him and catch up. We agreed to meet at a coffee shop, a place I used to frequent. I arrived early, thinking that since it hadn't been so long since we last met, he probably had a lot to say. After one day of meeting, I thought about it and decided to meet him. I thought about what he was doing in my class, but I couldn't figure out what he was doing. I thought about what he was doing in my class, but I couldn't figure out what he was doing. Meanwhile, I finally saw him walk into the coffin. He seemed to have hardly charged, teased. Sylvia raised a bright and stunning smile. Once we sat down, he began talking about the path from a tribal school mentor to our lives now. Gradually, his topic started to take a strange turn. He told me that he had made some investments over the years, as well as some interesting people, even mentioning that he was now having some very complicated business transactions. Listening to this, I was somehow indifferent but didn't think much about it. However, as we looked at him speaking about his experience, I sensed a strange sense of unreliability. Looking back, he hasn't been the most mature person back then. Throughout the conversation, I noticed that he often mentioned compassion. He said that he was a very kind person, and that he was a very kind person. I was very impressed by his kindness and the people I know nothing about. And his turn became increasingly mysterious. Just when I was about to leave, his stunning justice picked me to a place to show me his new project. We walked out of the coffin and right in front of the building. It looked like a building factory, but it confidently said that it was his coffin, his office. I was puzzled. Why would an investor invest in a building? I was surprised. That is because an investor should not choose such a place for his office. Even so, he appeared calm and told me that all the troubles were still running after the office. I started to feel that something was off. But when I turned around, the whole scene seemed unfamiliar. When I left, he said to me, You are always welcome to come back. We still have a lot to talk about. Until I left, I still couldn't decide if that night was real or not. especially when seeing his office looks.

Chinese_text: 去年寒假，我专程回老家看望奶奶。小时候，去她家总是我一年中的亮点。她总是做我最喜欢的菜，让空气中弥漫着熟悉的家的香气和她无尽的爱。现在，随着年龄的增长，她的行动不再像以前那样灵活，但她仍然坚持自己给我做饭。我劝她休息一下，但她只是笑着说，你在这里的时候，我有压力。她的话让我充满了温暖和苦乐参半的感觉。她对我的关心和照顾一直都是如此的深刻和周到。吃饭时，我玩得很开心。吃饭时，她回忆起我童年的故事，尤其是我爬上山寻找蛇的时候，我光荣的探险家。当她抓住他们时，她放声大笑，眼中充满了爱意，微笑着。那一刻，我感觉自己又回到了无忧无虑的日子，沉浸在她的初恋中。我爱上了她。我爱上了她。我爱上了她。我爱上了她。我爱上了她。我爱上了她。我爱上了我亲爱的妻子，还有她。她跟我说话，我们只是一起笑。我认为我们一起会失败。practicehua和我的朋友们不仅分享了他们的爱和关心。他们一生都在分享他们的支持和鼓励。这也是玛丽胜利的婚姻。我们一起笑了，她分享了许多我从未听说过的家庭故事，关于她年轻时的艰辛以及她是如何抚养这个家庭的。依恋和忧虑。她微微铰接的身影让我想起了时间的流逝，让我更加珍惜她的存在。在回家的路上，我的心里充满了对家人的思念，意识到他们真的是最温暖的支持来源。这次拜访让我明白，我们能给家人最好的礼物就是我们的陪伴，我决心花更多的时间和她在一起，珍惜我们在一起的每一刻。
English_text: Last winter break, I made a special trip back to my hometown to visit my grandmother. As a child, going to her house was always the highlight of my year. She would always make my favorite dish, filling the air with a familiar aroma of home and her endless love. Now, as she is getting older, her mobility isn't what it used to be, but she still insisted on cooking for me herself. I urged her to rest, but she just smiled and said, when you are here, I have the stress. Her words filled me with warmth and a bittersweet feeling. Her care and concern for me have always been so deep and thoughtful. During our meal, I had a lot of fun. In the meal, she recalled stories from my childhood, especially the times when I have climbed onto the mountain to find snakes, my glorious explorers. As she caught them, she laughed heartily, her eyes filled with affection and smiled. In that moment, I felt like I was back in those carefree days, enveloped in her junior love. I was in love with her. I was in love with her. I was in love with her. I was in love with her. I was in love with her. I was in love with her. I was in love with my own dear wife, and heresa. And she talked to me. We just laughed together. I think we would fail together. The practicehuaand my friends didn't just share their love and care. They shared their support and encouragement throughout their lives. It also đến mary's triumphant marriage. We laughed together, and she shared many family stories I had never heard about, about the hardships of her younger year and how she had raised the family. both attachment and worry. She slightly hinged figure remind me of the passage of time and made me cherish her presence even more. On the way back, my heart was full of thoughts of family, realizing that they are truly the warmest source of support. This visit helped me understand that the best gift we can give our family is our presence, and I resolved to spend more time with her, treasuring every moment we have together.

Chinese_text: 在今年的国庆节,我去国家大剧院观看了京剧白蛇传。本次白蛇传的演出针对之前的老剧本进行了调整,在唱词和曲调上有所修改,并且加入了更多现代化的灯光和舞美,加入了更多群演群舞的环节,使之变得更像歌剧。本次演出是由许多著名演员和优秀青年演员参演,演出现场座无虚席,气氛也是非常热烈。演员们的一招一式一唱一和,都透露出了独特的感觉。观众们的掌声和欢呼声也是此起彼伏,整个剧场都洋溢着欢乐的气氛。但是,在过程中也出现了一点小意外。在水豆的打楼戏中,饰演白素贞的演员可能是太紧张了,出了一点小意外,呛掉了。但,在终场演出中,我还是觉得有一些遗憾,就是没有听到我最喜欢的唱段。我后来去查了一下,是因为这次演出对唱词有所调整,所以说就将那一段进行了改编。并且也是非常遗憾,这次演出它是舍弃掉了之前的意向,所以我希望以后能看到更全的白色段,期待下次的演出。
English_text: On this year's National Day, I went to the National Centre for the Performing Arts to watch the Beijing Opera "Legend of the White Snake". The performance of "The Legend of the White Snake" has been adjusted based on the previous old script, with modifications made to the lyrics and melody, as well as the addition of more modern lighting and stage design, and more group performances and dances, making it more like an opera. This performance was performed by many famous actors and outstanding young actors, and the venue was packed with people. The atmosphere was also very lively. The actors' every move and gesture conveyed a unique feeling. The applause and cheers of the audience also echoed one after another, and the entire theater was filled with a joyful atmosphere. However, a small accident also occurred during the process. In the building scene of Shuidou, the actor who played Bai Suzhen may have been too nervous and had a small accident, causing her to choke. However, in the final performance, I still felt a bit regretful as I didn't hear my favorite singing piece. I later checked and found out that it was because there were some adjustments to the lyrics in this performance, so that section was adapted. And it's also very regrettable that this performance abandoned its previous intention, so I hope to see more complete white segments in the future and look forward to the next performance.
Extracted_Text: 在今年的国庆节,我去国家大剧院观看了京剧白蛇传。本次白蛇传的演出针对之前的老剧本进行了调整,在唱词和曲调上有所修改,并且加入了更多现代化的灯光和舞美,加入了更多群演群舞的环节,使之变得更像歌剧。本次演出是由许多著名演员和优秀青年演员参演,演出现场座无虚席,气氛也是非常热烈。演员们的一招一式一唱一和,都透露出了独特的感觉。观众们的掌声和欢呼声也是此起彼伏,整个剧场都洋溢着欢乐的气氛。但是,在过程中也出现了一点小意外。在水豆的打楼戏中,饰演白素贞的演员可能是太紧张了,出了一点小意外,呛掉了。但,在终场演出中,我还是觉得有一些遗憾,就是没有听到我最喜欢的唱段。我后来去查了一下,是因为这次演出对唱词有所调整,所以说就将那一段进行了改编。并且也是非常遗憾,这次演出它是舍弃掉了之前的意向,所以我希望以后能看到更全的白色段,期待下次的演出。

Chinese_text: 那是初三的一个冬天,寒风肆意地在窗外怒号,仿佛整个世界都被冻成了冰冷的模样。每当我踏出教室,刺骨的寒意就像无情的利刃刺入肌肤,让人无法呼吸。即使外面是那样的寒冷,阳光依然顽皮地透过窗户洒进教室,静静地铺满了课桌。光线温柔而灿烂,仿佛是一位温暖的朋友在寒冷冬日里轻轻抚摸着我们的内心,带来一丝丝宁静与安慰。整个上午,我们埋头在课本与作业中,笔尖在作业本上飞速地跃动,仿佛时间也随之悄悄溜走,我们完全没有察觉。窗外,那寒冷的冬日正悄悄酝酿着一场惊喜,在我们的世界里,只有黑板上的知识点和紧张的复习。而心中,已然没有了其他空间。那时,我们不知道,生活的美好时光总是在不经意间降临。到了下午,斜阳渐渐稀邪,天色逐渐暗淡,灰蒙天幕仿佛也在为即将发生的事做着预示。突然,雪花肆意地飞舞,最初那些雪花如轻盈般的羽毛缓缓下落,似乎是天空中最温柔的祝福。渐渐地,雪花遇见秘籍。仿佛无数的小精灵在天空中欢快地舞蹈,随着风旋律起舞旋转。轻轻飘落到地面每一片雪花,都是大自然的诗行。诗行,都是冬日的一抹柔情。我不由自主地放下手中的笔,凝望窗外的雪景。那一刻,我的心突然变得异常宁静。所有的学习者,我都在想。所有的学习压力和作业的烦恼,都在这一刻,烟消云散。隔着玻璃,我似乎能闻到雪花的清香,那是一种彻底净化心灵的清香。雪花悄无声息地覆盖了一切,也悄悄地洗涤我内心的浮躁,让我又感到一阵久违的轻松与愉悦。随着雪越下越大,校园内的树木、操场甚至屋檐都被盖上了。整个世界仿佛披上了一层洁白的纱衣,柔和而安静。空气中弥漫着雪的气息,一切都变得格外清晰,格外宁静。那一刻,我忍不住开始幻想。下课后,我将在草地上肆意地奔跑。脚踩着松软的积雪上,发出嘎吱嘎吱的声响。那种无忧无力的快乐,像阳光一样,却又不断地飞过我身体。我心中的烦恼,我心中的烦恼,我心中的烦恼,我心中的烦恼。我心中的烦恼,我心中的烦恼,我心中的烦恼。我们像一群失去羁绊的孩子,沉浸在这雪白的世界里,直到天色暗淡下来。回忆起那些飘洋的雪花,我依旧能感觉到那份放下所有的烦恼的心。我依旧能感觉到那份放下所有的烦恼的心。我依旧能感觉到那份放下所有的烦恼的心。那一天,像是为我洗泥内心的尘埃,带来了无尽的欢乐和温暖。生活中的美好往往就在我们不经意间悄悄降临。生活中的美好往往就在我们不经意间悄悄降临。生活中的美好往往就在我们不经意间悄悄降临。
English_text: It was a winter in the third year of junior high school, and the cold wind howled wildly outside the window, as if the whole world had been frozen into a cold appearance. Every time I step out of the classroom, the piercing chill pierces my skin like a merciless blade, making it impossible to breathe. Even though it was so cold outside, the sunlight still mischievously streamed into the classroom through the window, quietly covering the desks. The light is gentle and brilliant, as if a warm friend gently caresses our hearts in the cold winter, bringing a hint of tranquility and comfort. Throughout the morning, we buried ourselves in our textbooks and homework, with our pens jumping rapidly on our notebooks, as if time had slipped away quietly without us noticing. Outside the window, the cold winter is quietly brewing a surprise. In our world, there are only knowledge points on the blackboard and tense reviews. And in my heart, there is no other space left. At that time, we didn't know that the beautiful moments of life always come unexpectedly. In the afternoon, the setting sun gradually faded away, the sky gradually dimmed, and the gray sky seemed to be foreshadowing what was about to happen. Suddenly, snowflakes danced wildly, and those snowflakes fell slowly like light feathers, seemingly the gentlest blessing in the sky. Gradually, Snowflake encountered the secret code. It's as if countless little elves are dancing joyfully in the sky, dancing and spinning with the melody of the wind. Every snowflake gently falling to the ground is a poetic line of nature. Poetry lines are all a touch of tenderness in winter. I couldn't help but put down the pen in my hand and gaze out at the snowy scenery outside the window. At that moment, my heart suddenly became unusually peaceful. All learners, I am thinking. All the study pressure and homework troubles disappear in this moment. Through the glass, I seem to be able to smell the fragrance of snowflakes, a scent that thoroughly purifies the soul. Snowflakes silently covered everything and washed away my inner restlessness, making me feel a long lost sense of ease and joy. As the snow grew heavier, the trees, playground, and even eaves on campus were covered. The whole world seems to be draped in a pure white veil, soft and quiet. The air was filled with the scent of snow, and everything became particularly clear and peaceful. At that moment, I couldn't help but start fantasizing. After class, I will run freely on the grass. Stepping on the soft snow, there was a creaking sound. The carefree and powerless joy, like sunshine, constantly flies over my body. The troubles in my heart, the troubles in my heart, the troubles in my heart, the troubles in my heart. The troubles in my heart, the troubles in my heart, the troubles in my heart. We are like a group of children who have lost their bonds, immersed in this snow-white world until the sky darkens. Recalling those snowflakes drifting across the ocean, I can still feel the heart that let go of all worries. I can still feel the heart that lets go of all my troubles. I can still feel the heart that lets go of all my troubles. That day was like washing away the dust from my heart, bringing endless joy and warmth. The beauty in life often quietly descends upon us unintentionally. The beauty in life often quietly descends upon us unintentionally. The beauty in life often quietly descends upon us unintentionally.

Chinese_text: 那是一个秋天的下午，我回到儿时的小镇看望我的祖母，我已经多年没去看望过她了。这座城镇可能还是原来的样子，但感觉既熟悉又充满活力。街道、街角的咖啡馆和主干道旁的一排房子都还在，但比我的记忆更安静、更慢。路过之后，我慢慢地到达了祖母家。敲门前我停顿了一下，门开了，我祖母来了。我们紧紧地拥抱在一起，时间在她脸上刻下了皱纹，在她的头发上洒下了油脂。但她的温暖和爱让我想起了我的祖母。我们坐下来享受夜晚，我开始想知道房间是什么样子的。在客厅里，我能闻到她做饭的味道，一扇有家庭照片的门和我孩子的头顶。一切似乎都没有受到时间的影响，尽管房间似乎更小了。我们一起吃饭，聊着最近的生活更新，但随着时间的推移，我们的谈话变得有点悲观。我和更重。我祖母开始谈论她失去的朋友和过去的美好时光。我能感到深深的悲伤，因为我意识到我们失去了多少时间。尽管我们试图保持积极的态度，但空气中弥漫着一种不可否认的失落感。当我该离开的时候，我对过去的情绪和对未来的不确定性交织在一起。我紧紧地握住祖母的手，答应她我会经常回来看望她。那一天，我明白了，尽管时间从我们身上夺走了很多，但爱和回忆是永恒的。Amara.org社区的字幕
English_text: It was on an autumn afternoon, I returned to my childhood town to see my grandmother, whom I hadn't visited in years. The town was likely the same, yet it felt both familiar and alive. The streets, the corner cafe, and the row of houses along the main road were all still there, but quieter and slower than my memories. Following the pass about, I slowly reached my grandmother's house. I paused before knocking, and when the door opened, there was my grandmother. We hugged tightly, time had etched wrinkles in her face and sprinkled grease through her hair. But her warmth and love reminded me of my grandmother. We sat down to enjoy the evening, and I began to wonder what the room was like. In the living room, I could smell her cooking, a door with family photos and my child's head tops. Everything seemed untouched by time, though the room seemed smaller. We ate food together and chatted about recent life updates, but as time passed, our conversation turned a little gloomy. I and heavier. My grandmother started talking about the friends she had lost and the good times from the past. I could feel deep sadness because I realized how much time had taken away from us. Even though we tried to stay positive, there was a undeniable sense of loss hanging in the air. When it was time for me to leave, I had a mix of emotions for the past and uncertainty about the future. I held my grandmother's hand tightly and promised her I would come back to visit more often. That day, I learned that even though time takes so much from us, love and memories are forever. Subtitles by the Amara.org community

Chinese_text: 一周前，我和朋友们去山上徒步旅行。我们刚刚决定，昨晚我们把所有必需品都装进包里，比如衣服、鞋子和我们需要吃和喝的东西。徒步旅行很有挑战性，但很有收获。我们为登上顶峰付出了很多努力。然而，我们欣赏了令人惊叹的景色和下面的山谷。在山顶，我们还看了日落，感受到了一种成就感。第二天，我们探索了周围的沼泽地。我们很欣赏这景色。和朋友们一起吃饭。
English_text: A week ago, I went on a hiking trip to the mountain with my friends. We just decided that last night we packed our bags with all the essentials like the clothes and shoes and something we need to eat and drink. The hike was so challenging but rewarding. We paid a lot of effort to go on the peak. However, we enjoyed the breathtaking views and the valley below. At the top, we also watched the sunset, feeling a sense of accomplishment. The next day, we explored the surrounding moors. And we enjoyed the view. And enjoyed meals with my friends.
Extracted_Text: A week ago, I went on a hiking trip to the mountain with my friends. We just decided that last night we packed our bags with all the essentials like the clothes and shoes and something we need to eat and drink. The hike was so challenging but rewarding. We paid a lot of effort to go on the peak. However, we enjoyed the breathtaking views and the valley below. At the top, we also watched the sunset, feeling a sense of accomplishment. The next day, we explored the surrounding moors. And we enjoyed the view. And enjoyed meals with my friends.

Chinese_text: 2021年的时候我去了成都,这次旅行真的是特别难忘,因为成都是一座非常有活力又有文化底蕴的城市,然后它整体的氛围氛围是非常悠闲的,我一下子就爱上了,最让我印象深刻的是,当地人就是特别的友好,然后让我们整个旅程都非常愉快,因为他们很乐于助人。当然去成都的话一定要尝尝四川美食,像我们当时就去了很多的小餐馆,路边摊,印象最深刻的肯定是火锅,我们还尝了这麻婆豆腐,担担面,都特别好吃,但是太辣了,有时候会辣肚子,这次之死旅行中最难忘的一站是。那个成都的大熊猫,凡旅研究之地的基地。那些大熊猫啃竹子玩耍,真的是很可爱,都舍不得离开。除此之外,我们还去了那个宽窄巷子有很多的老式建筑,然后还尝了一些传统小吃,买了点特色的竞争品。我觉得最让我印象深刻的,也是让我最喜欢的成都的地方就是,它悠闲的生活节奏,它虽然是一个大城市,但是没有那种匆忙的感觉,像上海北京,不像这种一线城市的样子,但它也很繁华,然后它也充满了一些丰富的文化,让这次旅行特别有意义。我真的希望有还能够再去一次成都,而且我也认为成都是一个非常宜居的城市,有可能可以考虑一下在成都养老吧。反正给人留下很好的体验。
English_text: In 2021, I went to Chengdu, and this trip was really unforgettable because Chengdu is a very dynamic and culturally rich city. The overall atmosphere is very relaxed, and I fell in love with it right away. What impressed me the most was that the locals were very friendly, which made our entire journey very enjoyable because they were very helpful. Of course, when we go to Chengdu, we must try Sichuan cuisine. For example, we went to many small restaurants and roadside stalls at that time. The most impressive thing must be hot pot. We also tasted Mapo tofu and Dandan noodles, which are particularly delicious, but too spicy, sometimes spicy. The most memorable stop in this death trip is. The giant panda in Chengdu is the base of Fanlv Research. Those giant pandas gnawing on bamboo and playing are really cute, they can't bear to leave. In addition, we also went to the Kuanzhai Alley where there are many old-fashioned buildings, and tried some traditional snacks and bought some unique competitive products. I think the most impressive and my favorite place in Chengdu is its leisurely pace of life. Although it is a big city, there is no sense of rush, like Shanghai and Beijing, which are not like first tier cities. However, it is also bustling and full of rich culture, making this trip particularly meaningful. I really hope to go to Chengdu again, and I also think Chengdu is a very livable city. Maybe you can consider retiring in Chengdu. Anyway, it leaves a great experience for people.

Chinese_text: 在2018年的暑假,我刚刚从初中毕业,于是我和母亲一同踏上了向往已久的英国之旅。在出发前,我通过唐顿庄园、皇冠、维多利亚女王等音剧,对英国的历史和文化有了初步的了解和浓厚的兴趣。这些剧集让我对英国的贵族生活、王室历史和维多利亚时代的辉煌有了直观的感受。我们的旅程从伦敦开始,这座城市以其丰富的历史遗迹和文化氛围而闻名。尽管我们到达时,大本中正在维修,未能一睹其全貌,但这并没有减少我们对这座城市的热爱。我们在伦敦的街头漫步,感受着这座城市独特的魅力,乘坐邮轮在泰晤士河上缓缓前行,两岸的风光如同一幅幅流动的画卷,让人目不暇接。我们参观历史悠久的皇家海军学院,探访了格林尼治天文台,还参观了圣保罗大教堂和威斯敏斯特大教堂。这些建筑的宏伟与精致让我们对英国的宗教和建筑艺术有了更深的认识。伦敦的天气晴天很难一见,大多数都是灰蒙蒙的阴天,偶尔还会下起小雨,但这并没有影响我们的游览性质。我们在这些天气晴天的天气,反而增添了一份英伦风情。雨中的伦敦有着别样的浪漫和诗意,我们撑着伞穿梭在古老的街道上,仿佛自己也成为了那些音剧中的一员。在伦敦的行程结束后,我们又前往了苏格兰的首府爱丁堡,这座城市以其古老的城堡、窄窄的街道和丰富的文化活动而闻名。在爱丁堡,我们仿佛穿越回了中世纪,感受到了苏格兰的历史和文化。我们参观了爱丁堡城堡,了解了苏格兰的往事历史,还漫步在皇家英里大道上,感受着这座城市的活力与魅力。这次英国之旅不仅让我亲身体验了英国的历史和文化,也让我对这个世界有了更深的理解和认识。每一座城市,每一座建筑,每一条街道都承载着故事,讲述着历史。这些经历如同宝贵的财富,会永远珍藏在我的记忆中。这些经历如同宝贵的财富,会永远珍藏在我的记忆中。
English_text: In the summer of 2018, I had just graduated from junior high school, so my mother and I embarked on the long-awaited journey to the UK. Before departure, I gained a preliminary understanding and strong interest in the history and culture of England through musicals such as Downton Abbey, The Crown, and Queen Victoria. These TV series gave me a vivid experience of the aristocratic life, royal history, and the glory of the Victorian era in Britain. Our journey begins in London, a city renowned for its rich historical sites and cultural atmosphere. Although we arrived while Big Ben was undergoing repairs and couldn't get a full view of it, it didn't diminish our love for this city. We strolled through the streets of London, feeling the unique charm of the city. We took a cruise slowly on the Thames River, and the scenery on both sides was like flowing paintings, making us dazzled. We visited the historic Royal Naval Academy, visited the Greenwich Observatory, and also visited St. Paul's Cathedral and Westminster Abbey. The grandeur and delicacy of these buildings have given us a deeper understanding of religion and architectural art in Britain. The weather in London is rarely sunny, mostly cloudy with occasional light rain, but this does not affect the nature of our visit. We have added a touch of British charm to these sunny days. London in the rain has a unique romance and poetry. We shuttle through the ancient streets with umbrellas, as if we have also become a part of those musical dramas. After our trip to London, we went to Edinburgh, the capital of Scotland, which is famous for its ancient castles, narrow streets, and rich cultural activities. In Edinburgh, we seem to have traveled back to the Middle Ages and experienced the history and culture of Scotland. We visited Edinburgh Castle, learned about Scotland's past history, and strolled along the Royal Mile, experiencing the vitality and charm of the city. This trip to the UK not only allowed me to personally experience the history and culture of the country, but also gave me a deeper understanding and recognition of the world. Every city, every building, and every street carries stories and tells history. These experiences are like precious treasures that will forever be cherished in my memory. These experiences are like precious treasures that will forever be cherished in my memory.

Chinese_text: 几年前，我和一群朋友去了伦敦。在探索这座城市时，我们偶然发现了一条狭窄的小巷，两旁是旧砖墙和常春藤覆盖的拱门。小巷的尽头是一家几乎隐蔽的小书店。它的木制标志，几乎看不清，从哪里来的？阅读无声页。奇怪的是，它战胜了我，我走了进去。商店光线昏暗，货架一直延伸到天花板，塞满了各种尺寸和年龄的书。空气中弥漫着废纸和木抛光剂的香味。当我走过过道时，我的眼睛被一本放在高架子上的奇特的书吸引住了。与其他信件不同，它没有标题或标记，只有一个普通的、风化的信纸封面。我小心翼翼地放下它，打开它。在里面，我发现了用优雅的草书写满手写笔记的页面。这篇文章似乎描述了一段穿越非凡之地、永恒黄昏之城和低语之谷的旅程。每一个描述都很生动，仿佛作者真的去过那里。当我站在那里看书时，一位老妇人从柜台后面走了出来。她的银发整齐地扎了起来，粉蓝色的眼睛似乎看穿了我。她带着温暖的微笑走近说：那本书一直在等你。她的话吓了我一跳。我紧张地笑了，以为她在开玩笑。但她继续说，这只是一个读者。你必须收下。我犹豫了一下。当我问这本书多少钱时，她只是挥手说：这已经是你的了。我既困惑又好奇，手里拿着书离开了商店。后来，我试图找到文中提到的地方的信息。但是，即使是现在，我的搜索者也一无所获。这本书放在我的书架上。这是软糖。这是未知的。有时候，我想知道那家书店和那个神秘的女人是不是真的。引擎很快就发动了，直接达到了我的成绩。劳拉，谢谢你抽出时间。不客气。你现在可以走了，丽莎。谢谢你，本。
English_text: Few years ago, I visited London with a group of friends. While exploring the city, we stumbled upon a narrow alley lined with old brick walls and ivy-covered arches. At the very end of the alley was a small, almost hidden bookstore. Its wooden sign, barely legible, from where? Read the silent page. It curiously got the better of me, and I stepped inside. The store was dimly lit, with shelves that stretched to the ceiling, crammed with books of every size and age. The scent of aged paper and wood polish filled the air. As I passed the aisles, my eyes were drawn to a peculiar book lying flat on a high shelf. Unlike the others, it had no title or markings, just a plain, weathered letter cover. I carefully put it down and opened it. Inside, I found pages filled with handwritten notes in an elegant, cursive script. The writing seemed to describe a journey through extraordinary places, the city of eternal twilight, and the valley of whispers. Each description was vivid, as though the writer had truly been there. As I stood there reading, an elderly woman emerged from behind the counter. Her silver hair was tied back neatly, and her pink-blue eyes seemed to see right through me. She approached with a warm smile and said, That book has been waiting for you. Her words startled me. And I laughed nervously, assuming she was joking. But she continued, It's just a reader. You must take it. I hesitated. When I asked how much the book cost, she simply waved her hand and said, It's already yours. Bewildered but intrigued, I left the store with the book in hands. Later, I tried to find information about the places mentioned in the text. But, my searchers came up empty, even now. The book sits on my shelf. It's gummy. It's is untold. Sometimes, I wonder if that bookstore and the mysterious woman were even real. The engine took off in no time and went straight to my result.Laura, thank you for your time. You're welcome. You can go now LISA. Thank you, Ben.

Chinese_text: 回顾2004年我四年级时来到西藏的童年旅行，这是我最神奇的经历之一。这是我第一次去这样一个独特的地方旅行。即使在近10年后的今天，这段记忆仍然清晰地印在我的脑海里。我记得我爸爸一直提醒我，因为海拔很高，穿过我们的汽车，看到一场强烈的地震，要慢慢走。我几乎不听，直到我真的感觉到稀薄的空气让我有点头晕。妈妈总是让我喝水，像放克一样看着我。要有高度感，我必须慢慢走才能到达山顶。但不知何故，死亡的强光让一切都变得更加冒险。幸运的是，我们执行了一项特殊任务。当地的食物是与我年轻的护照有关的。我仍然记得我的第一口茶。这和我预想的完全不同。起初，我对这篇独特的、略显零散的文字眨了眨眼。但在旅行结束时，我实际上要求更多。高地山谷到处都是，面包、小吃，甚至饮料。大多数公用事业公司可能最初都让她感觉到了变化，但她非常喜欢烹饪，所以我们带了几个包裹回家。风景绝对令人叹为观止。即使对我下一岁的自己来说，我也能看到那些在风中飘过的色彩斑斓的淡黑色山脉，以及那些似乎触及寒冷多云天空的白雪皑皑的山脉。这一切感觉就像走进了一个不同的世界。我记得我和父母坐在一起，看着阳光把山染成金色和紫色。感觉就像我们站在世界之巅。对我来说，这段记忆尤其让我难以忘怀。也许有一天我会有机会回到家，与过去相比。我所有的记忆现在都很特别，因为它们在我这么小的时候就改变了我对文化和多样性的理解。令人惊讶的是，随着年龄的增长，童年的影响如何继续影响我们的观点。
English_text: Looking back at my childhood travel when I came to Tibet in 2004 when I was in fourth grade, this was done as one of the most magical experiences. It was my first time traveling to such a unique space. And even now, almost 10 years later, the memory remains vivid in my mind. I remember how my dad kept reminding me to walk slowly because of the altitude, through our cars, seeing an energetic earthquake. I barely listened until I actually felt the thin air making me slightly dizzy. Mom would constantly make me drink water and watch me like a funk. To have any sense of altitude, I would have to walk slowly to get to the top of the mountain. But somehow, the death's great lights made everything feel more adventurous. Luckily, we were on a special mission. The local food was accomplished with a relation to my young passport. I can still remember my first sip of tea. It was nothing like I expected. At first, I winked my nose to the unique slightly scattered text. But by the end of our trip, I was actually asking for more. The highland valley was everywhere, in bread, snacks, and even drinks. Most utilities may have caused her initially to feel the change, but enough loving the cooking so much that we brought several packages home. The landscape was absolutely breathtaking. Even to my next-year-old self, I was able to see the mountains with their colorful pale black fleeting in the wind, and the snow-capped mountains that seemed to touch the cold, cloudy skies. It all felt like stepping into a different world. I remember sitting with my parents watching the sunshine paint the mountains in shades of gold and purple. It felt like we were on top of the world. With me, this memory particularly stuck with me. Perhaps I'll get the chance one day to go home to percentage-un these old days. All my memories are so special now as they shift my understandings of culture and diversity at such a young age. It's amazing how the influence from our childhood continues to influence our perspective as we grow older.

Chinese_text: 去年冬天,我有一次机会去拜访我一直想见但是从来没有见过的祖父。当时我就是完成了一场重要的考试,然后我的心情非常非常愉悦。所以我的爸爸妈妈决定就是带我回到他们的家乡,就是在一个云南大山的深处。到达这个村庄的时候,就是已经很晚了。但是这个空中就是有一个我很好闻的气味。但是村里就是没有灯光。但是当我抬头的时候,夜空中的清醒就是非常的亮。爷爷在门口等待我们,他是一个非常和蔼的人,他的穿着非常的朴素,脸上带着笑容。他是第一次见到我,他是非常仔细地看着我,说我小时候长得和爸爸长得一模一样。第二天早上,爷爷就是带我去了村子后面的小山坡。他指着一棵树说是他年轻的时候种下的,这棵树现在就是已经非常非常的高。我摸着这个树干粗糙的外皮。然后爷爷讲述他年轻的时候的故事。那时候他就是在田间劳作,还有和就是我的奶奶认识的美好回忆。以及他们是如何就是把我的父亲养大的。这些故事就是把我带回了那个遥远的时候。虽然我在村子里面只待了三天,但这些日子给我留下了深刻的印象。我觉得我就是更加地了解了爷爷。也懂更加地了解了爷爷。也懂更加地了解父母成长的背景。离开的时候,爷爷把他的一块珍藏的表送给我,说这是我们家族的传承物。希望我能好好保管。
English_text: Last winter, I had an opportunity to visit my grandfather whom I had always wanted to see but had never met before. At that time, I had just completed an important exam, and my mood was very, very happy. So my parents decided to take me back to their hometown, deep in the mountains of Yunnan. When we arrived at this village, it was already very late. But there is a scent in the air that I really smell. But there are no lights in the village. But when I looked up, the clarity in the night sky was very bright. Grandpa is waiting for us at the door. He is a very kind person, dressed very plainly and with a smile on his face. It was the first time he saw me. He looked at me very carefully and said that I looked exactly like my father when I was young. The next morning, my grandfather took me to the small hill behind the village. He pointed to a tree and said it was planted when he was young, and now the tree is very, very tall. I touched the rough outer skin of this tree trunk. Then Grandpa told the story of his youth. At that time, he was working in the fields and had beautiful memories of meeting my grandmother. And how they raised my father. These stories took me back to that distant time. Although I only stayed in the village for three days, these days left a deep impression on me. I think I just got to know my grandfather better. I also gained a better understanding of my grandfather. I also have a better understanding of the background of my parents' upbringing. When I left, my grandfather gave me his precious watch, saying it was an inheritance of our family. I hope I can take good care of it.
Extracted_Text: 去年冬天,我有一次机会去拜访我一直想见但是从来没有见过的祖父。当时我就是完成了一场重要的考试,然后我的心情非常非常愉悦。所以我的爸爸妈妈决定就是带我回到他们的家乡,就是在一个云南大山的深处。到达这个村庄的时候,就是已经很晚了。但是这个空中就是有一个我很好闻的气味。但是村里就是没有灯光。但是当我抬头的时候,夜空中的清醒就是非常的亮。爷爷在门口等待我们,他是一个非常和蔼的人,他的穿着非常的朴素,脸上带着笑容。他是第一次见到我,他是非常仔细地看着我,说我小时候长得和爸爸长得一模一样。第二天早上,爷爷就是带我去了村子后面的小山坡。他指着一棵树说是他年轻的时候种下的,这棵树现在就是已经非常非常的高。我摸着这个树干粗糙的外皮。然后爷爷讲述他年轻的时候的故事。那时候他就是在田间劳作,还有和就是我的奶奶认识的美好回忆。以及他们是如何就是把我的父亲养大的。这些故事就是把我带回了那个遥远的时候。虽然我在村子里面只待了三天,但这些日子给我留下了深刻的印象。我觉得我就是更加地了解了爷爷。也懂更加地了解了爷爷。也懂更加地了解父母成长的背景。离开的时候,爷爷把他的一块珍藏的表送给我,说这是我们家族的传承物。希望我能好好保管。

Chinese_text: 在初三的暑假,我终于实现了自己的心愿,去了日本旅行。这次旅行让我见识到了一个既现代又充满传统文化气息的国家,每一天都让我感到兴奋和满足。第一天我来到了巴坂的环球影城,这个地方总是在我的计划清单中。当我进入延迟的哈利波特区时,整个人都激动得快跳起来了。电影中那个宏伟壮观的霍格乌兹城堡,此刻真真实实的矗立在我眼前,那种感觉简直难以置信。我走在小路上,仿佛真的进入了魔法世界,连周围的空气都好像变得有魔力。接着我去了小黄人区,这里有一个非常有趣的VR体验项目。在游玩过程中,我觉得自己好像在天上飞翔,穿梭于各种场景之中。但实际上我只是坐在原地。这个项目让我充分感受到了科技的魅力,既惊险又好玩。晚上我非常幸运地赶上了一场花火大会,烟花在夜空中绽放,五光十色。伴随着打哨花火这首音乐,整个夜晚仿佛都被点亮了。烟花的美丽让我不禁感慨,这一刻的景色将永远印刻在我的记忆中。第二天我来到了奈良公园。这是一个著名的景点,人群里有许多小鹿,它们完全不怕人的称之为竹章靠近你。我买了一些鹿仙贝喂它们,这些可爱的小家伙围着我,温柔地啃着手中的食物。能够与这些动物明智于接触,让我感受到人与自然的和谐,也让我这一天充满了温暖。之后我去过富士山,在通往山脚的路上,我们经过了著名的音乐公路。车轮辩国路面。我看见一张电视,竟然真的奏响了一首美妙的旋律。这种奇妙的设计让我大开眼界。在富士山脚下,我拍了一张罗森便利店与富士山同框的照片。这是这趟旅行中特别有纪念意义的一刻。第三天我参观了大阪城公园,感受到了历史的厚重感,还去了一趟天皇居住的宫殿。最后一天我来到了横滨中华城。看到中国的传统文化,在日本也胜利了。我感受到了热烈欢迎,心中满是自豪和感动。这趟日本之旅让我收获了许多美好的回忆,也让我更加期待下一次的旅行。我希望有机会再次一次继续探索这个美丽的国度。
English_text: In the summer vacation of my third year of junior high school, I finally fulfilled my wish and went on a trip to Japan. This trip has allowed me to experience a country that is both modern and full of traditional cultural atmosphere, and every day makes me feel excited and satisfied. The first day I came to Universal Studios in Baban, which was always on my list of plans. When I entered the delayed Harry Potter section, I was so excited that I almost jumped up. The magnificent Hogwarts Castle in the movie stands before my eyes, and the feeling is simply unbelievable. I walked on the path, as if I had truly entered a magical world, and even the surrounding air seemed to become magical. Then I went to the Minions area, where there was a very interesting VR experience project. During the game, I felt like I was flying in the sky, shuttling through various scenes. But in reality, I'm just sitting in place. This project allowed me to fully experience the charm of technology, which is both thrilling and fun. In the evening, I was very lucky to catch up with a fireworks festival, and the fireworks bloomed brightly in the night sky. Accompanied by the music of whistling fireworks, the entire night seemed to be illuminated. The beauty of fireworks makes me marvel, and the scenery of this moment will forever be imprinted in my memory. The next day, I arrived at Nara Park. This is a famous scenic spot with many deer in the crowd, who are not afraid of people calling them bamboo sticks and approaching you. I bought some deer fairy shells to feed them, and these cute little ones surrounded me, gently nibbling on the food in their hands. Being able to interact with these animals wisely has made me feel the harmony between humans and nature, and has also filled my day with warmth. Afterwards, I went to Mount Fuji and on the way to the foot of the mountain, we passed the famous music road. The wheels debate the national road surface. I saw a TV and it actually played a beautiful melody. This wonderful design has opened my eyes. At the foot of Mount Fuji, I took a photo of Rosen Convenience Store framed with Mount Fuji. This is a particularly memorable moment on this trip. On the third day, I visited Osaka Castle Park and felt the weight of history. I also went to the palace where the emperor lived. On the last day, I arrived at Yokohama Chinatown. Seeing traditional Chinese culture, it has also won in Japan. I felt a warm welcome, filled with pride and emotion in my heart. This trip to Japan has brought me many wonderful memories and made me look forward to my next trip even more. I hope to have the opportunity to explore this beautiful country again.

Chinese_text: 2022年，我第一次去看望我的曾祖父。他住在一个被青山和田野环绕的安静的小村庄里。尽管他已经90多岁了，但他仍然非常敏锐，精力充沛。我从家人那里听到了很多关于他的故事，但亲自见到他感觉就像是我的传统翻开了新的一页。当我们坐在他的客厅里，喝着他准备的茶时，我问他关于我祖父的童年。当他开始回忆往事时，他脸上露出了温暖的笑容。你爷爷是个淘气的男孩，他一边喝茶一边说，但他有一颗金子般的心。我记得有一次，他大约7岁的时候，试图帮我在田里种水稻。他没有把秧苗种在正确的地方，而是把它们撒得到处都是。当我问他在做什么时，他告诉我，他希望水稻可以自由地生长在任何他们喜欢的地方。我们都嘲笑我年轻的祖父在田野里跑来跑去的照片，完全不知道他正在造成的考验。我的曾祖父然后告诉我，有一次我祖父救了一只小狗。有一天，他发现它在雨中瑟瑟发抖，便把它带回家，藏在房间里。他说这是一只很好的狗，他和它玩得很开心。他是一只非常好的狗。他对我很好。他说他非常感激我，他说他很高兴见到我。我祖父很高兴见到了我，他也说他很开心见到我。看到他我很高兴，因为他认为我不会让他养它。当我发现它时，他恳求我让这只狗留下来，并承诺他会照顾它。我无法拒绝他的决心。我非常高兴。我非常高兴。我非常高兴。我非常高兴。我感到非常自豪。我感到非常自豪。我感到非常自豪。那天，我学到了很多，不仅仅是几个故事。我对家族的价值观和历史有了更深入的了解。我对家族的价值观和历史有了更深入的了解。这是一次给我留下了深刻印象的访问，这是一个给我留下深刻印象的参观，并向自己承诺要珍惜世代相传的故事和智慧。并承诺自己会珍惜世代相传的故事和智慧。
English_text: In 2022, I visited my great-grandfather for the first time. He lived in a small, quiet village surrounded by green hills and fields. Despite being over 90 years old, he was still remarkably sharp and full of energy. I had heard many stories about him from my family, but meeting him in person felt like a connection to a new chapter of my heritage. As we sat in his living room, drinking tea he had prepared, I asked him about my grandfather's childhood. His face lit up with a warm smile as he began to recall the past. Your grandfather was a naughty boy, he said, drinking the tea, but he had a heart of gold. I remember one time, when he was about 7 years old, he tried to help me plant rice in the field. Instead of planting the seedlings in the right place, he scattered them all over the place. When I asked him, what he was doing, he told me he wanted the rice plants to be free to grow wherever they liked. We both laughed at the photo of my young grandfather running around the field, completely unaware of the trials he was causing. My great-grandfather then told me about a time when my grandfather saved a small dog. He found it shivering in the rain one day and brought it home, hiding it in his room. He said it was a very good dog, and he had a lot of fun with it. He was a very good dog, and he was very kind to me. He said he was very grateful to me, and he said that he was very happy to see me. My grandfather was very happy to see me, and he said that he was very happy to see me. I was very happy to see him, because he thought I wouldn't let him keep it. When I discovered it, he begged me to let the dog stay, promising he would take care of it. I couldn't say no to his determination. I was very happy. I was very happy. I was very happy. I was very happy. I felt very proud. I felt very proud. I felt very proud. That day, I learned so much, more than just a few stories. I gained a deeper understanding of my family's values and history. I gained a deeper understanding of my family's values and history. It was a visit that left a lasting impression on my heart, It was a visit that left a lasting impression on my heart, and promised myself to cherish the stories and wisdom passed on through generations. and promised myself to cherish the stories and wisdom passed on through generations.

Chinese_text: 去年夏天，在我童年的家被卖掉之前，我不得不最后一次去参观。这所房子曾经是一个充满舒适和回忆的地方，现在却空无一人。当我穿过房间时，每个空间似乎都回荡着塑造我生活的笑声和事件。我站在客厅里，回忆起曾经充满温暖的家庭聚餐和聚会。熟悉的旧家具的味道和地板的吱吱声让一切都恢复了原状。最难的部分是走进我的旧卧室。现在看起来很不一样。我失去了所有的东西。这些年来，我一直有这种感觉。我走到木地板前，小时候，我在那里用小刀盖住了自己的名字。我已经很多年没想过了。但当我用手指在凹槽上摩擦时，我感到一种深深的怀旧感。这就像是对自己的一部分说再见。后来，我去了花园。我小时候在那里玩了无数个小时，如果不带点东西，我就活不下去。我从地上捡起一块小石头，这是一个简单的手势，但感觉就像带了一块地方。我把它塞进口袋里。知道这会让我想起我再也回不去的房子。这是一个非常情绪化的一天。当我最后一次锁上门时，我意识到这是我生命中一个重要部分的结束。这所房子分享了我是谁，住在这里感觉就像生活在我童年的一部分后面。不仅仅是房子，还有那些让它回家的回忆、人们和山脉。说再见比我想象的要难，但我知道是时候放手了。
English_text: Last summer, I had to visit my childhood home for the last time before it was sold. The house, which had always been a place of comfort and memories, was now empty. As I walked through the rooms, each space seemed to echo with the laughter and the events that had shaped my life. I stood in the living room, remembering the family dinners and gatherings that once filled it with warmth. The familiar smell of old furniture and the creaking of the floors brought everything rushing back. The hardest part was going into my old bedroom. It looks so different now. Empty of all the things I had. I had felt it with all the years. I walked to the wooden floorboard where, as a child, I had covered my name with a small knife. I hadn't thought about it in years. But as I rubbed my finger over the grooves, I felt a deep sense of nostalgia. It was like saying goodbye to a part of myself. Afterward, I went out to the garden. It was there I spent countless hours playing as a child, and I couldn't live without taking something with me. I picked up a small rock from the ground, a simple gesture, but it felt like taking a piece of the place with me. I split it into my pocket. Knowing it would remind me of the house when I could no longer return. It was a deeply emotional day. As I locked the door behind me for the last time, I realized it was closing the chapter on an important part of my life. The house had shared who I was, and living it felt like living behind a piece of my childhood. It wasn't just the house, but it was the memories, the people, and the mountains that had made it home. Saying goodbye was harder than I had imagined, but I knew it was time to let go.

Chinese_text: 在去年十月的时候,我接到了公司的一个要求让我去杭州出差。这次出差非常的顺利,所以我的工作提前完成了,让我有了一个自由支配的下午。所以我临时决定自己一个人去西湖一边走走,欣赏一下杭州著名的景点和秋季的风光。在那里,我碰到了一位正在拍照的老爷爷,举着一个很大的单反相机,对着西湖拍来拍去。后面他似乎有点体力不支,于是询问我他是否能够得到我的帮助。所以我帮助他完成了最后一组照片的拍摄,我们聊了一会儿天,得知他是本地退休的文物修复专家。所以他主动带我去参观了一些游客不常去的角落,给我讲解这些不知名的角落所隐藏的历史的痕迹。隐藏的历史的故事。他跟我分享了非常非常多关于西湖的典故。在断桥边,我们一起看到了最美的日落。最后,我们还一起去街边的小摊上喝了一杯经典导播。最后,我们还一起去街边的小摊上喝了一杯经典导播。最后,大家交换了联系方式。经过这次旅行,我了解了杭州一些过去的不为人知的故事。从另一个角度,见证了杭州这样一个古老而美丽的城市。也算是与杭州与西湖一次惊喜不弃而遇。但又美好的令人怀念的邂逅。好吧。
English_text: In October last year, I received a request from the company to go on a business trip to Hangzhou. This business trip went very smoothly, so my work was completed ahead of schedule, giving me a free afternoon to manage. So I decided to go to West Lake alone and enjoy the famous scenic spots and autumn scenery in Hangzhou. There, I met an old man who was taking photos, holding a large DSLR camera and shooting back and forth at West Lake. Later on, he seemed a bit exhausted, so he asked me if he could get my help. So I helped him complete the final set of photos, and after chatting for a while, we learned that he is a retired local expert in cultural relic restoration. So he took me to visit some corners that tourists don't often go to, and explained to me the historical traces hidden in these unknown corners. The story of hidden history. He shared with me a lot of allusions about West Lake. At the edge of the broken bridge, we saw the most beautiful sunset together. Finally, we went to a small stall on the street together and had a cup of classic live streaming. Finally, we went to a small stall on the street together and had a cup of classic live streaming. Finally, everyone exchanged contact information. After this trip, I learned about some unknown stories from the past in Hangzhou. From another perspective, witnessing Hangzhou as an ancient and beautiful city. It can also be considered a surprise encounter with Hangzhou and West Lake. But also a beautiful and nostalgic encounter. ok
Extracted_Text: 在去年十月的时候,我接到了公司的一个要求让我去杭州出差。这次出差非常的顺利,所以我的工作提前完成了,让我有了一个自由支配的下午。所以我临时决定自己一个人去西湖一边走走,欣赏一下杭州著名的景点和秋季的风光。在那里,我碰到了一位正在拍照的老爷爷,举着一个很大的单反相机,对着西湖拍来拍去。后面他似乎有点体力不支,于是询问我他是否能够得到我的帮助。所以我帮助他完成了最后一组照片的拍摄,我们聊了一会儿天,得知他是本地退休的文物修复专家。所以他主动带我去参观了一些游客不常去的角落,给我讲解这些不知名的角落所隐藏的历史的痕迹。隐藏的历史的故事。他跟我分享了非常非常多关于西湖的典故。在断桥边,我们一起看到了最美的日落。最后,我们还一起去街边的小摊上喝了一杯经典导播。最后,我们还一起去街边的小摊上喝了一杯经典导播。最后,大家交换了联系方式。经过这次旅行,我了解了杭州一些过去的不为人知的故事。从另一个角度,见证了杭州这样一个古老而美丽的城市。也算是与杭州与西湖一次惊喜不弃而遇。但又美好的令人怀念的邂逅。好吧。

Chinese_text: 小学四年级的时候,我和我的妈妈还有她的一个好朋友一起去爬了泰山。当时我很小,但是因为我不知道泰山有多高,以及路上会遇到什么样的困难,所以我还是跟着去了。但是如果放到现在的话,我大概就不会选择去爬山了,因为爬山对我来说真的有点太累了。反正那个时候,我沿着蜿蜒的山路前行,我真的是累得气喘吁吁的,但是他们所有人就一直在说,啊,再爬一小段就到顶了,反正就一直被骗着就爬了上去。然后爬着,这的时候,路边那些卖饮料啊,卖烤肠的呀,其实我记不清还有没有烤肠了,反正就是卖一些吃的吧,都很贵。所以我们当时好像还是自己背了一些水,这就更累了。不过爬台山比较有意思的是,路上的那些风景还不错,从高处往下看,一大片全都是绿油油的,真的会让人心情变得很好。不过还有一点就是,从高处往下看的时候,我印象特别深的是,有一小段,它那个台阶实在是有点太陡了。我当时还挺害怕的,反正我约等于是直接坐在了那个台阶上,我是往后靠着坐着的,因为我很害怕掉下去。不过总体来说,我们当时爬到顶的时候,已经是晚上了,我们还买了很厚的那种棉衣,不过我觉得它很脏。当时好像还稍微住了一晚上吧,准备转天早上起来看日出,我就记得那个时候特别特别冷,而且日出其实好像也没有很冷的感觉。我看到,印象里好像全都是被云给挡住了。不过总体来说还是挺有意思的。下山的时候就没有那么累了,但是下山会有一点害怕,真的很害怕掉下去。反正一路说说笑笑的,最后泰山也是全都爬下来了。
English_text: In the fourth grade of primary school, my mother and I climbed Mount Taishan Mountain together with one of her good friends. I was very young at that time, but because I didn't know how high Mount Taishan was and what difficulties I would encounter on the way, I followed. But if it were up to now, I probably wouldn't choose to go hiking because it's really too tiring for me. Anyway, at that time, I was walking along the winding mountain road, and I was really exhausted and panting. But all of them kept saying, 'Ah, climb a little bit more and you'll reach the top.' Anyway, I kept being deceived and climbed up. And then crawling, at this moment, there were those people selling drinks and grilled sausages on the roadside. Actually, I can't remember if there were any grilled sausages left, but they were just selling some food, they were all very expensive. So it seems like we carried some water ourselves at that time, which made us even more tired. But what's interesting about climbing Mount Tai is that the scenery on the way is pretty good. Looking down from a high place, a large area is all green, which really makes people feel good. But one more thing is that when looking down from a high place, what impressed me most was that there was a small section where the steps were a bit too steep. I was quite scared at the time, anyway I was sitting directly on that step, leaning back because I was afraid of falling. Overall, when we climbed to the top, it was already evening and we bought a thick cotton coat, but I think it was very dirty. At that time, I seemed to have stayed for a little night, preparing to wake up the next morning to watch the sunrise. I remember it was particularly cold at that time, and the sunrise didn't seem very cold either. I see that in my impression, everything seems to be blocked by clouds. But overall, it's quite interesting. When I go down the mountain, I'm not so tired anymore, but I feel a little scared and really afraid of falling down. Anyway, we talked and laughed all the way. Finally, Mount Taishan also climbed down.

Chinese_text: 2019年夏天，我有机会参观了旧金山，这座城市以其文化和阳光明媚的国家美景而闻名。这是我第一次来加利福尼亚，我渴望探索这座城市所提供的一切。我在一个阳光明媚的早晨抵达旧金山，首先让我印象深刻的是那座橙色的Anaconda Gate Bridge。我决定从步行过桥开始我的旅行。狂风大作，但景色令人叹为观止。当我走的时候，我可以看到风拍打着桥的刨床，城市的溜冰线在我身后延伸。过桥后，我前往自由渔夫瀑布，这是城市最受欢迎的旅游景点之一。空气中充满了活动，街道上挤满了表演者、卖新鲜海鲜的游客和来自世界各地的游客。我在泰国一家名为Float Lunch的小餐馆看到了它。这顿饭充满了食物。我饿极了。我饿了。我还有一点时间，所以我决定离开。我在去一家餐馆的路上，发现了一家非常好的餐馆，于是我决定试试自制的披萨配大蒜面包。食物很美味，餐厅温暖诱人的氛围让我有宾至如归的感觉。旧金山之旅不仅让我探索了这座城市丰富的历史，也让我对沿途遇到的人们的美丽和温暖有了更深的体会。尽管我的访问时间很短，但它在我心中留下了一个内心的盲点，我期待着有一天我能回来探索这座城市的更多地方。
English_text: In the summer of 2019, I had the opportunity to visit San Francisco, a city known for its culture and sunny national beauty. It was my first time in California, and I was eager to explore everything the city had to offer. I arrived in San Francisco on a sunny morning, and the first thing that struck me was the Anaconda Gate Bridge towering over the bed with its orange color. I decided to start my trip by taking a walk across the bridge. The wind has burst, but the view was breathtaking. As I walked, I could see the wind crashing against the planer of the bridge, and the city's skate line stretching out behind me. After crossing the bridge, I made my way to Free Fisherman Waterfall, one of the most popular tourist spots in the city. The air was flushing with activity, filled with streets, performers, visitors selling fresh seafood, and tourists from all over the world. I spotted at a small in-Thailand restaurant called Float Lunch. The meal was full of food. I was very hungry. I was hungry. I had a little more time, so I decided to leave. I was on my way to a restaurant that I found a really good restaurant and I decided to try the homemade pizza with a side of garlic bread. The food was delicious, and the warm, inviting atmosphere of the restaurant made me feel right at home. The journey to San Francisco not only allowed me to explore the city's rich history and but also gave me a deeper appreciation for the beauty and the warmth of the people I met along the way. Despite the small duration of my visit, it left an inside blind mark on my heart, and I look forward to the day when I can return and explore more of the city.

Chinese_text: 去年夏天，我和朋友们参观了一个小岛，这是我经历过的最激动人心的旅行之一。该岛以其清澈的海水和充满活力的珊瑚礁而闻名。但真正引起我们注意的是当地人推荐的悬崖跳跃点。我一直有点恐高，但我的朋友们坚持认为这将是一次难忘的经历。当我们到达时，这个地方比我想象的还要令人惊叹。悬崖高耸于塔水之上，你甚至可以看到远处那些小船。空气很暖和，海浪拍打岩石的声音。伊迪？伊迪，令人兴奋。你知道，一群当地人已经在那里欢呼，优雅地潜入下面的大海。起初，我犹豫了一下。站在悬崖边，我觉得我的腿在发抖，你知道的。高度看起来比我想象的要大得多，跳跃的声音很可怕。但我的朋友们鼓励我，告诉我如果我不尝试，我会后悔的。其中一人甚至挥了挥手。伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪呢？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？伊迪？感觉就像我在飞翔。当我下水时，天气又冷又清爽，我浮出水面，听到了朋友们的欢呼声。我忍不住笑了。我感到如此充满活力，如此自由，在第一次跳跃之后，我无法得到足够的东西。下午剩下的时间，我们轮流潜入水中，探索附近的局部裂缝。当太阳开始落山时，悬崖被金色的光芒照耀着，我们都同意这是我们一生中最美好的日子之一。
English_text: Last summer, I visited a small island with my friends, and it turned out to be one of the most exciting trips I've ever had. The island was known for its crystal clear waters and vibrant coral reefs. But what exactly caught our attention was the cliff-jumping spots that locals recommended. I'd always been a little afraid of heights, but my friends insisted it would be an unforgettable experience. When we arrived, this place was even more stunning than I had imagined. The cliffs rose high above the tower water, and you could even see those small boats up in the distance. The air was warm, and the sound of waves crashing against the rocks. Edie? Edie, to the excitement. A group of locals was already there, you know, cheering and diving gracefully into the sea below. At first, I hesitated. Standing at the edge of the cliff, I felt my legs were shaking, you know. The height looked much greater than I had imagined, and the sound of jumping was terrifying. But my friends encouraged me, telling me that I'd regret it if I didn't try. One of them even waved. Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? And Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? Edie? feel like I was flying. When I hit water, it was cold and refreshing, and I surfaced to the sound of cheers from my friends. I couldn't stop laughing. I feel so alive, so free, and after that first jump, I couldn't get enough. We spent the rest of the afternoon taking turns diving into the water and exploring the nearby local rifts. By the time the sun began to set, the cliffs were battered in golden light, and we all agreed it was one of the most best days of our lives ever.

Chinese_text: 上个假期我去了塞班岛旅游,那确实是一个让人流连忘返的地方。为了这次塞班岛之行,我们提前做了不少功课,在塞班岛的活动非常丰富,最吸引我的就是潜水和丛林探险。第一天我们来到了军舰岛,我报名参加了一个浮潜之旅。首先我们坐快艇抵达了岛上,换上了浮潜设备,跟着潜水教练一起潜入了水中。水下的世界真是让人赞叹不已,各种色彩斑斓的鱼在珊瑚丛中穿梭。导游还特地带我们去了一个海归籍的地方,看到海归在水中优雅的游动。这些都是我从来没见过的场景。接下来的一天,我去了丛林探险,塞班岛的热带雨林充满了神秘感。我和领头人选择了一条蓝洞的路线,这条路线穿过茂密的森林,一路上能看到许多当地特有的植物和鸟类。在这条路线前进的时候,我们站在悬崖边俯瞰,能看到海水冲击岩石,它形成的天然洞穴。蓝色的海水在阳光下闪着迷人的光芒,属实让人惊叹。在塞班岛,不能错过的还有它的美食。岛上有许多融合了当地的美国风味的料理。我特别喜欢当地的椰子蟹,餐厅的老板还教我们如何正确地吃这种大型的螃蟹。螃蟹蟹肉鲜嫩多汁,配上当地特色的蘸料,味道别有一番风味。在最后一天,我还体验了塞班岛著名的日落,来到岛上的最高点,鸟岛观景台,等待着太阳西沉。坐在悬崖边看着鸟岛,我特别喜欢当地的椰子蟹。当地的太阳慢慢落入海平线,心中充满了宁静和满足。这次塞班岛之旅,让我领略到了大自然的规律和丰富的文化体验。我离开它时,真有些不舍,希望我还有机会再次来到这个美丽的岛屿。
English_text: Last holiday, I went on a trip to Saipan Island, which was indeed a place that left people reluctant to leave. For this trip to Saipan Island, we did a lot of homework in advance. The activities on Saipan Island were very diverse, and what attracted me the most were diving and jungle exploration. On the first day, we arrived at Warship Island and I registered for a snorkeling trip. Firstly, we arrived on the island by speedboat, changed into snorkeling equipment, and dived into the water with our diving instructor. The underwater world is truly breathtaking, with various colorful fish swimming through the coral reefs. The tour guide also took us to a place with overseas returnees and saw them swimming gracefully in the water. These are scenes I have never seen before. The next day, I went on a jungle adventure, and the tropical rainforest of Saipan Island was full of mystery. The leader and I chose a blue cave route that passes through dense forests, where we can see many local plants and birds along the way. As we proceed along this route, we stand at the edge of the cliff and overlook the natural caves formed by the impact of seawater on the rocks. The blue seawater shines with a charming light in the sunlight, truly stunning. In Saipan Island, there is also its delicious food that cannot be missed. There are many dishes on the island that blend local American flavors. I particularly like the local coconut crab, and the restaurant owner even taught us how to eat this large crab correctly. Crab meat is tender and juicy, paired with local dipping sauce, giving it a unique flavor. On the last day, I also experienced the famous sunset on Saipan Island and arrived at the highest point on the island, the Bird Island Observation Deck, waiting for the sun to set in the west. Sitting on the edge of the cliff watching Bird Island, I particularly like the local coconut crabs. The local sun slowly set on the horizon, filling my heart with tranquility and satisfaction. This trip to Saipan Island allowed me to experience the laws of nature and rich cultural experiences. When I left it, I felt a little reluctant, hoping that I would have the chance to come to this beautiful island again.
