Chinese_text: 我和我的几个朋友去参加一个周末的艺术展览,我们都挺喜欢艺术的,所以提前计划好参观。当天的展览的作品也非常精彩,有许多不同风格的艺术品,其中有一些挺独特的让我印象深刻。我特别喜欢一幅色彩丰富的抽象画,这幅画的每一笔每一画都充满了那种强烈的情感,让我不自觉的沉浸在其中。正在我专心欣赏这幅画的时候,一个陌生人突然走到我的旁边,开始和我聊起这幅画的创作背景。他告诉我这幅画是他自己放作的,我一下子就懵了。就完全没有想到眼前这位人很可能是……艺术家本人。吃惊过后,我们聊了很多,他向我解释了这幅画的每个细节,包括颜色的选择,画笔的运用,还有创作过程中这个灵感的来源。他还跟我们分享了许多关于艺术创作的心得和挑战。最后也是非常热情的邀请我参加他的个人画展。我感到非常的惊讶。因为这次偶遇不仅让我更加了解艺术,还让我意识到艺术作品背后往往隐藏着艺术家付出的巨大努力以及情感投入。所以这次经历让我觉得我对艺术有了更深的理解,也让我更加尊重那些默默创作的艺术家们。
English_text: My friends and I are going to attend a weekend art exhibition. We all love art, so we have planned our visit in advance. The exhibition on that day was also very exciting, with many works of art in different styles, some of which were quite unique and left a deep impression on me. I particularly like an abstract painting with rich colors. Every stroke and painting in this painting is filled with strong emotions, making me unconsciously immersed in it. While I was engrossed in admiring this painting, a stranger suddenly walked up to me and started chatting with me about the background of its creation. He told me that this painting was created by himself, and I was immediately stunned. I never expected that the person in front of me could be... the artist himself. After being surprised, we talked a lot. He explained to me every detail of this painting, including the choice of colors, the use of brushes, and the source of inspiration during the creative process. He also shared with us many insights and challenges related to artistic creation. Finally, he warmly invited me to attend his solo art exhibition. I am very surprised. Because this encounter not only deepened my understanding of art, but also made me realize that behind artistic works, there is often a great effort and emotional investment put in by artists. So this experience has made me feel that I have gained a deeper understanding of art, and it has also made me respect those artists who silently create.
Extracted_Text: 我和我的几个朋友去参加一个周末的艺术展览,我们都挺喜欢艺术的,所以提前计划好参观。当天的展览的作品也非常精彩,有许多不同风格的艺术品,其中有一些挺独特的让我印象深刻。我特别喜欢一幅色彩丰富的抽象画,这幅画的每一笔每一画都充满了那种强烈的情感,让我不自觉的沉浸在其中。正在我专心欣赏这幅画的时候,一个陌生人突然走到我的旁边,开始和我聊起这幅画的创作背景。他告诉我这幅画是他自己放作的,我一下子就懵了。就完全没有想到眼前这位人很可能是……艺术家本人。吃惊过后,我们聊了很多,他向我解释了这幅画的每个细节,包括颜色的选择,画笔的运用,还有创作过程中这个灵感的来源。他还跟我们分享了许多关于艺术创作的心得和挑战。最后也是非常热情的邀请我参加他的个人画展。我感到非常的惊讶。因为这次偶遇不仅让我更加了解艺术,还让我意识到艺术作品背后往往隐藏着艺术家付出的巨大努力以及情感投入。所以这次经历让我觉得我对艺术有了更深的理解,也让我更加尊重那些默默创作的艺术家们。

Chinese_text: 2021年,我去了一套农村,拜访我很久没见的表哥。表哥一家住在偏远的乡下,那里风景优美,四周都是起伏的山丘和广阔的田野,我已经很久没去那里了。所以,这次拜访让我感到既兴奋又怀念。到达村子那天,表哥开着他的小拖拉机来接我。村子的路不宽,但沿途两边的景色非常美丽,尤其是那大片的油菜花田。金黄色的花海一望无际,仿佛为大地铺上了一层温暖的产子。表哥一路上兴致勃勃地给我介绍村里的每一处变化,比如新修的桥梁,邻居家刚建好的新房,还有村里最近新开的农产品合作社。虽然村子没有城市的高楼大厦和繁忙的街道,但这种宁静简单的生活氛围让我感到非常放松。到家后,表哥的父母非常热情,给我端来了新鲜的水果和自家做的米酒。表哥的母亲很快就开始准备晚饭,我看到她从小院里带来了新鲜的蔬菜。那些蔬菜颜色翠绿,充满了生机。晚餐非常丰盛,有煮的鲜嫩的鸡汤,自家腌制的咸菜,还有刚从地里挖出来的土豆,特别香甜。这顿饭让我想起了小时候和家人们一起吃饭的情景。那种简单而充满爱的感觉,似乎让我的心一下子回到了过去。吃完饭后,表哥提议带我去村里的河边钓鱼,我们拿上竹竿和蚯蚓,走了十几分钟的田野小路来到了村外的那条小河边。河水非常清澈,水面上倒映着蓝茶。天河周围的树木,微风拂过,水面泛起层层涟漪,我找了一块大石头,坐下,把鱼饵抛进河中,然后静静地等,带着鱼饵上钩。河面非常安静,只能听到树叶被风吹动的沙沙声和几只蟋蟀的鸣叫声。我和表哥有一句没一句地聊着近况,聊到小时候我们一起玩捉迷藏的日子,那时候我们还小,无忧无虑,整个世界都像是我们的游乐场。表哥回忆起那些年我们偷吃邻居家葡萄的趣事,他说着便大笑起来,我也不禁笑出了声,仿佛那段美好的时光就在眼前。夜渐渐深了,我们没有钓到很多鱼,但这并不重要,我们坐在星空下,看着天上的星星一闪一闪,听着远处传来的几声蛙鸣,心里充满了宁静。表哥告诉我,他虽然生活在农村,但他对这样的生活很满意,他喜欢田野里的自由,喜欢劳作的踏实感,也喜欢与家人和邻里之间的温暖互动。我能感觉到,他的话语中带着对生活的热爱和对家乡的深情。那一晚,我和表哥谈了很多。也想了很多,虽然我们生活在不同的环境中,但彼此之间那份血浓于水的亲情始终没有改变。我深深感受到,乡村生活虽然没有繁华的都市光景,却有一种城市难以找到的宁静与温情。这次拜访让我更加珍惜这段难得的亲情,也让我重新认识到真正的快乐往往来源于简单而真实的生活。
English_text: In 2021, I went to a rural area to visit my cousin whom I hadn't seen in a long time. My cousin's family lives in a remote countryside with beautiful scenery, surrounded by undulating hills and vast fields. I haven't been there for a long time. So, this visit made me feel both excited and nostalgic. On the day I arrived at the village, my cousin came to pick me up in his small tractor. The road in the village is not wide, but the scenery on both sides along the way is very beautiful, especially the large rapeseed fields. The golden flower sea stretches endlessly, as if laying a warm layer of fertility on the earth. My cousin enthusiastically introduced me to every change in the village along the way, such as the newly built bridge, the neighbor's newly built house, and the recently opened agricultural cooperative in the village. Although the village does not have the high-rise buildings and busy streets of the city, this peaceful and simple living atmosphere makes me feel very relaxed. After arriving home, my cousin's parents were very enthusiastic and brought me fresh fruits and homemade rice wine. My cousin's mother quickly started preparing dinner, and I saw her bringing fresh vegetables from the small courtyard. Those vegetables are green in color and full of vitality. The dinner was very sumptuous, with fresh and tender chicken soup cooked, pickled vegetables marinated at home, and freshly dug potatoes, especially sweet and fragrant. This meal reminds me of eating with my family when I was a child. That simple and loving feeling seemed to take my heart back to the past. After dinner, my cousin suggested taking me fishing by the river in the village. We took bamboo poles and earthworms and walked a field path for more than ten minutes to the small river outside the village. The river water is very clear, with blue tea reflecting on the surface. The trees around Tianhe were swaying gently, causing ripples on the water surface. I found a large stone, sat down, threw the bait into the river, and waited quietly, taking the bait with me. The river is very quiet, only the rustling sound of leaves being blown by the wind and the chirping of a few crickets can be heard. My cousin and I were chatting about our recent situation, talking about the days when we played hide and seek together as children. At that time, we were still young, carefree, and the whole world was like our playground. My cousin recalled the funny stories of us stealing grapes from our neighbor's house in those years. As he spoke, he burst out laughing, and I couldn't help but laugh out loud, as if that beautiful time was right in front of me. As the night grew deeper, we didn't catch many fish, but that didn't matter. We sat under the starry sky, watching the stars twinkle in the sky and listening to the distant croaks of frogs, our hearts filled with tranquility. My cousin told me that although he lives in the countryside, he is very satisfied with this kind of life. He likes the freedom in the fields, the sense of security in working, and the warm interaction with his family and neighbors. I can feel that his words carry a love for life and deep affection for his hometown. That night, my cousin and I talked a lot. I have thought a lot about it, even though we live in different environments, the blood thicker than water bond between us has never changed. I deeply feel that although rural life does not have the bustling urban scenery, there is a kind of tranquility and warmth that cities cannot find. This visit has made me cherish this rare family bond even more, and has also made me realize that true happiness often comes from simple and authentic life.
